# Hwarang events
# by Silverswee(e)per

namespace = hwarang

##### Powers events

### Seek spiritual guidance - approach possible religious person

# Someone asks you for spiritual guidance - do you accept?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1 # Sure!
		
		piety = 50
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.2 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				any_friend = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				any_lover = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = greedy
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1 # Make a donation to charity and I'll do it!
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.3 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					trait = zealous
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					trait = charitable
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				NOT = {
					trait = kind
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				NOT = {
					trait = content
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = greedy
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1 # Pay me and I'll do it!
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.6 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				is_landed = yes
				has_dlc = "Conclave"
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_dlc = "Conclave"
			NOR = {
				owes_favor_to = FROMFROM
				holds_favor_on = FROMFROM
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_1 # Give me a Favor and I'll do it!
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.9 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				is_landed = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NAND = {
					is_voter = yes
					liege = {
						character = FROMFROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_dlc = "Conclave"
			owes_favor_to = FROMFROM
		}
		name = EVTOPTE_HWARANG_1 # Consider it repayment of the Favor and I'll do it!
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.12 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				is_landed = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NAND = {
					is_voter = yes
					liege = {
						character = FROMFROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTF_HWARANG_1 # Not happening!
		
		piety = -50
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROMFROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROMFROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROMFROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.15 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_friend = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_lover = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Request accepted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.2
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_2
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_2 # Just what I wanted to hear!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			clr_quest = {
				id = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.16 days = 30 random = 30 } # Lesson selection
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Religious person requests charity
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.3
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_3
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_3 # That sounds fair!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			clr_quest = {
				id = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.4 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.16 days = 30 random = 30 } # Lesson selection
		}
		
		scaled_wealth = {
			value = -1
			min = -100
			max = -1000
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = greedy
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_3 # Charity? Such nonsense!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.5 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = charitable
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = charitable
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = charitable
			}
		}
	}
}

# Other party agreed to charity
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.4
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_4
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_4 # Just what I wanted to hear!
	}
}

# Other party refused charity
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.5
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_5
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_5 # I see...
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_refused_guidance_offer
		}
	}
}

# Religious person requested payment
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.6
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_6
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_6 # That sounds fair!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			clr_quest = {
				id = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.7 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.16 days = 30 random = 30 } # Lesson selection
		}
		
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 1
			min = 100
			max = 1000
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = greedy
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_6 # Pay you? Ha!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.8 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = charitable
			}
			random = {
				chance = 5
				remove_trait = charitable
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = charitable
			}
		}
	}
}

# Other party agreed to payment
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.7
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_7
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_7 # Just what I wanted to hear!
	}
}

# Other party refused payment
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.8
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_8
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_8 # I see...
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_refused_guidance_offer
		}
	}
}

# Religious person requests Favor
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.9
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_9
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_9 # That sounds fair!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			clr_quest = {
				id = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.10 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.16 days = 30 random = 30 } # Lesson selection
		}
		
		FROM = {
			add_favor = ROOT
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROM = {
					is_landed = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_9 # A Favor? Never!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.11 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = trusting
			}
		}
	}
}

# Other party accepted Favor
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.10
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_10
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_10 # Just what I wanted to hear!
	}
}

# Other party refused Favor
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.11
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_11
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_11 # I see...
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_refused_guidance_offer
		}
	}
}

# Religious person requests repayment of Favor
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.12
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_12
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_12 # That sounds fair!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			clr_quest = {
				id = quest_hwarang_spiritual_guidance
			}
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.13 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.16 days = 30 random = 30 } # Lesson selection
		}
		
		remove_favor = FROM
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROM = {
					is_landed = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_12 # Lose my Favor? Never!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.14 days = 1 random = 2 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = trusting
			}
		}
	}
}

# Other party accepted repayment of Favor
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.13
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_13
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_13 # Just what I wanted to hear!
	}
}

# Other party refused repayment of Favor
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.14
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_14
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_14 # I see...
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_refused_guidance_offer
		}
	}
}

# Religious person refused request
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.15
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_15
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_15 # I see...
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_refused_me_guidance
		}
	}
}

### Seek spiritual guidance - guidance setup

# Hidden event to select something for religious person to try to teach
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.16
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		# Clear all flags first
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_chaste
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_temperate
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_charitable
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_diligent
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_patient
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_kind
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_humble
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_brave
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_content
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_gregarious
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_honest
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_just
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_trusting
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_zealous
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_lustful
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_gluttonous
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_greedy
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_slothful
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_wroth
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_envious
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_proud
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_arbitrary
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_craven
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_cruel
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_cynical
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_deceitful
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_paranoid
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_shy
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			# First pick a good trait we have and could teach
			random_list = {
				1 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOR = {
							trait = chaste
							trait = celibate
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = chaste
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						any_lover = {
							character = FROM
						}
						NOR = {
							any_spouse = {
								character = FROM
							}
							any_consort = {
								character = FROM
							}
						}
					}
					set_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_chaste
				}
				1 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0

							AND = {

									trait = arbitrary
								}
							}

						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = shy
						}
					}
					set_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_shy
				}
			}
			
			character_event = { id = hwarang.17 } # Send the event to the teacher
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.16 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# Religious person gets to select which lesson to give
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.17
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_17
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_chaste
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_17 # Let's teach chastity!
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.18 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = chaste
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = celibate
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = lustful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01 # Sabotage!
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
		}
	}

		# Clear all flags
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_chaste
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_temperate
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_charitable
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_diligent
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_patient
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_kind
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_humble
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_brave
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_content
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_gregarious
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_honest
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_just
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_trusting
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_zealous
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_lustful
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_gluttonous
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_greedy
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_slothful
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_wroth
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_envious
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_proud
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_arbitrary
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_craven
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_cruel
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_cynical
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_deceitful
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_paranoid
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_spiritual_guidance_shy
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - chastity

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about chastity
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.18
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_18
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_18 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.19
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							FROM = {
								any_lover = {
									NOR = {
										any_spouse = {
											character = FROM
										}
										any_consort = {
											character = FROM
										}
										character = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM has a lover and considers breaking up with them
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.20 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = lustful
							}
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						trait = proud
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						trait = stubborn
					}
					# FROM is Lustful and is having second thoughts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.24 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOR = {
								trait = eunuch
								trait = celibate
								trait = homosexual
								AND = {
									is_female = yes
									age = 45
									OR = {
										NOT = {
											trait = immortal
										}
										immortal_age > 44
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.1
						is_landed = no
					}
					# FROM thinks having further heirs might be good, and thus being Lustful would be good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.28 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = chaste
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.33 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.39 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM approached by someone attractive seeking to tumble them
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.41 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = chaste # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = lustful
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Chaste, and possibly Celibate too
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.43 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.46 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I have a lover - maybe break up with them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.20
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_20
	picture = GFX_evt_lovers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_lover = {
			limit = {
				NOR = {
					any_spouse = {
						character = ROOT
					}
					any_consort = {
						character = ROOT
					}
					character = FROM
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = breakup_target
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_20 # It is for the best...
		
		remove_lover = event_target:breakup_target
		event_target:breakup_target = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.21 } # Inform the lover
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:breakup_target = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.22 } # Inform teacher of progress
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = lustful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_20 # No, I can't do that...
		
		prestige = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.23 } # Inform teacher of lack of progress
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform lover
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.21
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_21
	picture = GFX_evt_lovers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_21 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
	}
}

# I am Lustful and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.24
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_24
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_24 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = celibate
				}
				remove_trait = lustful
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.25 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.26 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = celibate
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_20 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.27 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.27
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_27
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_27 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher of doubts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.29
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_29
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_29 # Trust me; this is all part of HighGod's plan!
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = gregarious
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = celibate
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = chaste
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.30 days = 5 } # Teacher is convincing
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = shy
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = lustful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					is_dumb_trigger = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.31 days = 5 } # Teacher is unconvincing
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_31
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_31 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_31 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.32 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.33
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_33
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_33 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_33 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.34 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.34
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_34
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_34 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.35 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = lustful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_33 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.36 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = chaste
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_34 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.37 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = lustful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.35
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_35
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_35 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_35 # "Sorry" won't cut it!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.38 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.36
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_36
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_36 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_36 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.38 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher tells me they simply can't do it

	id = hwarang.37
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_37
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_37 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

		}

# Approached by an attractive servant with appropriate gender and orientation - how dedicated are you to this chastity thing?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.41
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_41
	picture = GFX_evt_dancing
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = no
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
			}
			create_character = {
				female = yes
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				trait = underhanded_rogue
				trait = lustful
				trait = fair
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = tempting_servant
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = yes
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
			}
			create_character = {
				female = no
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				trait = underhanded_rogue
				trait = lustful
				trait = fair
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = tempting_servant
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = no
				trait = homosexual
			}
			create_character = {
				female = no
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				trait = underhanded_rogue
				trait = lustful
				trait = fair
				trait = homosexual
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = tempting_servant
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = yes
				trait = homosexual
			}
			create_character = {
				female = yes
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				trait = underhanded_rogue
				trait = lustful
				trait = fair
				trait = homosexual
				random_traits = no
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = tempting_servant
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_41 # The flesh is weak...
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = celibate
			}
			remove_trait = celibate
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					trait = lustful
				}
			}
			add_trait = lustful
		}
		
		piety = -25
		event_target:tempting_servant = {
			save_event_target_as = sex_partner
			add_lover = ROOT
		}
		unprotected_sex_effect_event_target = yes
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.42 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = celibate
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_41 # I'm better than this!
		
		piety = 10
		
		event_target:tempting_servant = {
			leave_court_and_die_effect = yes
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.19 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.42

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion

	}
}

# This chastity thing seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.43
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_43
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_43 # I'm chaste now!
		
		add_trait = chaste
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.44 } # Inform teacher!
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = celibate
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_43 # I'm chaste now!
		
		add_trait = chaste
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		add_trait = celibate
		
		piety = 100
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.45 } # Inform teacher!
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				NOT = {
					trait = zealous
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				higher_tier_than = count
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				higher_tier_than = duke
			}
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - temperance

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about temperance
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.50
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_50
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_50 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.51 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.51
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOR = {
								trait = gluttonous
								trait = drunkard
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Gluttonous or a Drunkard and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.52 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = temperate
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.57 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.63 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = temperate # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							OR = {
								trait = gluttonous
								trait = drunkard
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Temperate
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.65 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.67 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.51 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.51 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Gluttonous or a Drunkard and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.52
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_52
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_52 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = gluttonous
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = gluttonous
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.53 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = drunkard
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = drunkard
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.54 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.55 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.51 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_52 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.56 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.57
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_57
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_57 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.51 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_57 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.58 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.58
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_58
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_58 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.59 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = gluttonous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = drunkard
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_58 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.60 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = temperate
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_58 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.61 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = gluttonous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = drunkard
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry

			}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.60
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_60
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_60 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.51 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_60 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.62 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher tells me they simply can't do it
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.61
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_61
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_61 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This temperance thing seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.65
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_65
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_65 # I'm temperate now!
		
		add_trait = temperate
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.66 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is Temperate

		}
	}

### Spiritual guidance - charity

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about charity
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.71
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_71
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_71 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.72
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = greedy
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Greedy and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.73 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = charitable
						}
					}
					# Suggest a charitable donation
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.77 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = greedy
						}
					}
					# Suggest giving money to teacher
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.83 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = charitable
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.90 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.96 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = charitable # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = greedy
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Charitable
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.98 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.100 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Greedy and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.73
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_73
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_73 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = greedy
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.74 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.75 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_73 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.76 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Greedy
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.74
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_74
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_74 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

# Teacher might suggest charitable donation
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.78
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_78
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_78 # You should do some charity!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.79 days = 1 } # Student gets event 
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = charitable
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_78 # It would be a bad idea...
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.82 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
}

# Charitable donation suggested
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.79
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_79
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_79 # Charity is good!
		
		scaled_wealth = -0.25
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.80 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_79 # Charity? What a silly idea!
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.81 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might suggest giving them money
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.85
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_85
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_economy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_85 # Sounds good!
		
		transfer_scaled_wealth = {
			to = FROM
			value = 0.25
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.86 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_85 # What a silly idea!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.87 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_85 # You're trying to exploit me!
		
		prestige = 100
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					any_friend = {
						character = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			add_rival = FROM
		}
		else = {
			remove_friend = FROM
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.88 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.90
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_90
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_90 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_90 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.91 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.91
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_91
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_91 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.92 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = greedy
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_91 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.93 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = charitable
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_91 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.94 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = greedy
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.93
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_93
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_93 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.72 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_93 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.95 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.98
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_98
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_98 # I'm charitable now!
		
		add_trait = charitable
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.99 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - diligence

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about diligence

	id = hwarang.104

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {

		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.105
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = slothful
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Slothful and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.106 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Diligence is hard work
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.110 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = stressed
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Stressed
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.112 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = wroth
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less patient
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.114 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = ambitious
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less content
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.117 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = diligent
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.120 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.126 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = diligent # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Diligent
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.128 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.130 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Slothful and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.106
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_106
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_106 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = slothful
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.107 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.108 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_106 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.109 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Slothful

	id = hwarang.107

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_107 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.109
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_109
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_109 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This diligence thing is hard work... do I really want to do it?

	id = hwarang.110
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_110
	picture = GFX_evt_stressed_ruler
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_110 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_110 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.111 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# This diligence thing is really stressful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.112
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_112
	picture = GFX_evt_stressed_ruler
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_112 # This is so stressful!
		
		add_trait = stressed
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.113 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# This takes too long - lose Patient/gain Wroth
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.114
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_114
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_114 # I grow impatient!
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = patient
			}
			remove_trait = patient
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.115 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = wroth
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.116 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.120
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_120
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_120 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_120 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.121 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.121
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_121
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_121 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.122 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_121 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.123 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_121 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.124 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_122 # "Sorry" won't cut it!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.125 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.123
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_123
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_123 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_123 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.125 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.124
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_124
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_124 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}
