	id = hwarang.127
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_127
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_127 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This diligence thing seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.128
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_128
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_128 # I'm diligent now!
		
		add_trait = diligent
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.129 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is Diligent
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.129
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_129
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_129 # That's great!
		
		prestige = 25
		piety = 25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might discover that it isn't going anywhere - ping Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.130
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.131 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.131
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_131
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_131 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.133 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_131 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.132 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.132
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_132
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_132 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.133
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.105 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - patience

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about patience
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.134
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_134
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_134 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.135
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = wroth
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Wroth and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.136 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Patience takes forever
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.140 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less diligent
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.142 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = content
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less ambitious
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.145 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.148 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.154 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = patient # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = wroth
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Patient
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.156 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.158 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Wroth and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.136
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_136
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_136 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = wroth
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.137 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.138 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_136 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.139 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Wroth
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.137
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_137
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_137 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}

				factor = 10

				factor = 0.1

			}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}

			}
		}
	}

			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}

# Patience is a virtue, and that means I can take it easy - lose Diligent/become Slothful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.142
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_142
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_142 # I can relax!
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = diligent
			}
			remove_trait = diligent
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.143 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = slothful
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.144 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Patience is a virtue, so I should be more content - lose Ambitious/become Content
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.145
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_145
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_145 # My goals must be smaller!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = ambitious
			}
			remove_trait = ambitious
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.146 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = content
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.147 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.148
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_148
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_148 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_148 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.149 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.149
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_149
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_149 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.150 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_149 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.151 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_149 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.152 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.150
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_150
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_150 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_150 # "Sorry" won't cut it!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.153 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.151
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_151
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_151 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_151 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.153 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher tells me they simply can't do it
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.152
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_152
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_152 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This patience thing seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.156
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_156
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_156 # I'm patient now!
		
		add_trait = patient
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.157 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is Patient

	id = hwarang.157
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_157
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might discover that it isn't going anywhere - ping Hwarang

	id = hwarang.158
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.159 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.161
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.135 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - kindness

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about kindness
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.162
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_162
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_162 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.163
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOR = {
								trait = envious
								trait = cruel
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Envious or Cruel and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.164 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = arbitrary
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less just
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.169 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = wroth
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM loses Wroth
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.172 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = kind
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.174 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.180 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = kind # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							OR = {
								trait = envious
								trait = cruel
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Kind
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.182 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.184 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Envious or Cruel and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.164
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_164
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_164 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = envious
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = envious
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.165 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = cruel
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = cruel
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.166 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.167 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_164 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.168 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.168
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_168
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_168 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the law doesn't let me be kind, is the law really good - lose Just/gain Arbitrary
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.169
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_169
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_169 # I should be Good rather than Lawful...
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = just
			}
			remove_trait = just
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.170 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = arbitrary
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.171 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang lost Just

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?

	id = hwarang.174
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_174
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_174 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_174 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.175 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.175
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_175
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_175 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.176 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = envious
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_175 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.177 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_175 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.178 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = kind
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry

	id = hwarang.176
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_176
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_176 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_176 # "Sorry" won't cut it!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.179 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.177
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_177
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_177 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_177 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.179 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher tells me they simply can't do it
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.178
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_178
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_178 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This kindness thing seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.182
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_182
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_182 # I'm kind now!
		
		add_trait = kind

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.183 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is Kind

	id = hwarang.183
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_183

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}

# Teacher might discover that it isn't going anywhere - ping Hwarang

	id = hwarang.184
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.185 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

			character_event = { id = hwarang.163 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop

### Spiritual guidance - humility

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about humility
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.188
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_188
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_188 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.189 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.189
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = proud
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Proud and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.190 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less diligent
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.194 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = uncouth
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less groomed
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.197 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = proud
						}
					}
					# FROM is proud of not being proud
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.200 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = humble
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.202 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.208 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = humble # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = proud
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Humble
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.210 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.212 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.189 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.189 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Proud and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.190
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_190
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_190 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = proud
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.191 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.192 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.189 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_190 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.193 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Proud
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.191
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_191
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_191 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	id = hwarang.193
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_193
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_193 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I should be humble, do I really need to work hard? - lose Diligent/become Slothful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.194
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_194
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_194 # I don't need to do great!
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = diligent
			}
			remove_trait = diligent
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.195 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = slothful
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.196 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.189 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.202
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_202
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_202 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.189 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_202 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.203 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.203
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_203
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_203 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.204 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_203 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.205 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_203 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.206 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

				trait = diligent

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.205
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_205
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_205 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.189 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_205 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.207 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher tells me they simply can't do it
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.206
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_206
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_206 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_210
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_210 # I'm humble now!
		
		add_trait = humble
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.211 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - bravery

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about bravery
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.216
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_216
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_216 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.217
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = craven
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Craven and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.218 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = trusting
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more trusting
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.222 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = zealous
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more zealous
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.225 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = ambitious
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more ambitious
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.228 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = brave
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.231 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.237 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = brave # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = craven
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Brave
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.239 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.241 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Craven and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.218
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_218
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_218 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = craven
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.219 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.220 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_218 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.221 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Craven

	id = hwarang.219
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_219
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_219 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_221
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_221 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# I should trust people, as mistrust is a sign of fear - lose Paranoid/gain Trusting
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.222
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_222
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_222 # I should stop being so paranoid!
		
		piety = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
			remove_trait = paranoid
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.223 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = trusting
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.224 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang lost Paranoid
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.223
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_223
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_223 # I see...
	}

	}

# I should not fear, for HighGod is with me! - lose Cynical/become Zealous
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.225
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_225
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_225 # For HighGod!
		
		piety = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = cynical
			}
			remove_trait = cynical
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.226 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = zealous
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.227 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.228
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_228
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_228 # I will brave any obstacle!
		
		prestige = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = content
			}
			remove_trait = content
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.229 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = ambitious
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.230 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.231
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_231
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_231 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_231 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.232 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.232
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_232
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_232 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.233 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = brave
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_232 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.234 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = craven
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_232 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.235 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = brave
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry

		}

			factor = 100

				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}

				factor = 10

			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_233 # "Sorry" won't cut it!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.236 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.234
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_234
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_234 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.217 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_234 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.236 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher tells me they simply can't do it
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.235
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_235
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_235 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This bravery thing seems right... right?

	id = hwarang.239
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_239
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_239 # Fear is for the enemy!
		
		add_trait = brave
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_brave
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_brave
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.240 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.242 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - contentness

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about contentness
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.245
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_245
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_245 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.246 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.246
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = ambitious
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Ambitious and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.247 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = kind
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = cruel
							NOT = {
								trait = envious
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes less envious
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.251 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = proud
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more proud
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.254 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = content
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.257 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.263 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = content # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = ambitious
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Content
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.265 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.267 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.246 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.246 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Ambitious and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.247
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_247
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_247 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = ambitious
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.248 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.249 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.246 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_247 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.250 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Ambitious

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.250
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_250
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_250 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I should be Content I should not be Envious - lose Envious/become Kind
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.251
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_251
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_251 # I should be less envious...
		
		piety = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = envious
			}
			remove_trait = envious
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.252 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = kind

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.253 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.246 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.257
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_257
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_257 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.246 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_257 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.258 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.258
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_258
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_258 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.259 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_258 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.260 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = ambitious
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_258 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.261 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_259

				trait = wroth

				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}

			}

		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.262 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.260
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_260
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_260 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.246 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_260 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.262 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# This contentness thing seems right... right?

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_265
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_265 # I'm content to be content
		
		add_trait = content
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_content
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.266 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - gregariousness

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about gregariousness
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.271
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_271
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_271 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.272
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = shy
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Shy and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.273 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more cruel
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.277 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = deceitful
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more deceitful
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.280 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = gregarious
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.283 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.289 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = gregarious # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = shy
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Gregarious
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.291 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.293 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Shy and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.273
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_273
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_273 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = shy
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.274 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.275 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_273 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.276 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Shy

	}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.276
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_276
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_276 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# I'm learning to use words well - let's use them in a cruel fashion! - lose Kind/gain Cruel
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.277
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_277
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_277 # I know of a good retort here!
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = kind
			}
			remove_trait = kind
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.278 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = cruel
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.279 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.280
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_280
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_280 # People are so easy to fool if you know what to say!
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = honest
			}
			remove_trait = honest
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.281 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = deceitful
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.282 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.283
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_283
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_283 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_283 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.284 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.284
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_284
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_284 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.285 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = gregarious
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_284 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.286 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = shy
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_284 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.287 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = gregarious
			}
		}
	}
}

				trait = wroth
			}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}

				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}

		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.286
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_286
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_286 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.272 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_286 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.288 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# This gregariousness thing seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.291
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_291
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_291 # I'm gregarious now!
		
		add_trait = gregarious
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.292 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}
