			character_event = { id = hwarang.294 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}

### Spiritual guidance - honesty

		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.298
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = deceitful
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Deceitful and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.299 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more cruel
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.303 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = gregarious
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more gregarious
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.306 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = honest
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.309 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.315 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = honest # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = deceitful
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Honest
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.317 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.319 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Deceitful and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.299
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_299
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_299 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = deceitful
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.300 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.301 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_299 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.302 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Deceitful

	id = hwarang.300
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_300
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_300 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.302
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_302
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_302 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I shouldn't lie, I should tell harsh truths - lose Kind/gain Cruel
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.303
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_303
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_303 # The truth might hurt, but it's still the truth!
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = kind
			}
			remove_trait = kind
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.304 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = cruel
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.305 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# If I should be honest, I should speak out - lose Shy/gain Gregarious
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.306
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_306
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_306 # People are so easy to fool if you know what to say!
		
		prestige = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = shy
			}
			remove_trait = shy
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.307 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = gregarious
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.308 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.309
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_309
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_309 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_309 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.310 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.310
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_310
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_310 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.311 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_310 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.312 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_310 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.313 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.311
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_311
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_311 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_311 # "Sorry" won't cut it!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.314 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.312
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_312
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_312 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_312 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.314 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# This honesty thing seems right... right?

	id = hwarang.317
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_317
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_317 # I can honestly say I'm honest now!
		
		add_trait = honest
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_honest
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_honest
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.318 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.318

	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_318 # That's great!
		
		prestige = 25
		piety = 25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might discover that it isn't going anywhere - ping Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.319
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.320 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.320
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_320
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_320 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.322 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_320 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.321 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.321
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_321
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_321 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.322
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.298 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - justice

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about justice
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.323
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_323
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_323 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.324
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = arbitrary
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Arbitrary and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.325 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more cruel
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.329 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = just
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.332 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.338 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = just # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = arbitrary
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Just
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.340 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.342 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Arbitrary and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.325
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_325
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_325 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = arbitrary
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.326 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.327 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_325 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.328 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Arbitrary

	id = hwarang.326

	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_326 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	id = hwarang.328
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_328
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_328 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I should be just, I can't always be kind - lose Kind/gain Cruel
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.329
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_329
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_329 # The law is the law!
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = kind
			}
			remove_trait = kind
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.330 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = cruel
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.331 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.332
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_332
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_332 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_332 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.333 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.333
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_333
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_333 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.334 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = just
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_333 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.335 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = arbitrary
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_333 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.336 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = just
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.335
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_335
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_335 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_335 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.337 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.343
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_343
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_343 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.345 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_343 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.344 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.344
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_344
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_344 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.345
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.324 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - trust

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about trust
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.346
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_346
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_346 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.347
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = paranoid
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Paranoid and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.348 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = shy
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more shy
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.352 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = trusting
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.355 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.361 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = trusting # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Trusting
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.363 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.365 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Paranoid and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.348
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_348
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_348 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = arbitrary
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.349 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.350 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_348 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.351 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Paranoid

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_349 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_351
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_351 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# It's easier to trust others if I avoid them - lose Gregarious/gain Shy
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.352
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_352
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_352 # If I only am with those I can trust, I can trust more...
		
		prestige = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = gregarious
			}
			remove_trait = gregarious
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.353 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = shy
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.354 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_355
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_355 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_355 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.356 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.356
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_356
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_356 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.357 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_356 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.358 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_356 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.359 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.358
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_358
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_358 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_358 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.360 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_363
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat

	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_363 # I trust this is good!
		
		add_trait = trusting
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
			}
			clr_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.364 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

			character_event = { id = hwarang.366 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.366
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_366
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_366 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.368 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_366 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.367 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.367
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_367
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_367 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.368
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.347 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - zeal

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about zeal
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.369
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_369
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_369 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.370
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = cynical
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Cynical and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.371 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							religion = ROOT
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							controls_religion = yes
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0 # Don't convert to unreformed Muist
						has_global_flag = korean_reformation
						religion = korean_pagan
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0 # Would no longer be a Hwarang
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								culture_group = koreanic
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM has a different religion and might convert or go zealous
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.375 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = proud
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more proud
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.379 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = zealous
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is bad
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.382 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.388 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = zealous # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = cynical
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								religion = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Zealous
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.390 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.392 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Cynical and am having second thoughts
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.371
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_371
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_371 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = cynical
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.372 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.373 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_371 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.374 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Cynical
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.372
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_372
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_372 # Good!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.374
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_374
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_374 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# My teacher has a different religion and is teaching me about zeal - what's up with that?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.375
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_375
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				OR = {
					religion = buddhist
					religion = taoist
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_375 # I'll convert, of course!
		
		piety = -25
		
		religion = FROM
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.376 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				FROM = {
					trait = gregarious
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_375 # I can't keep taking lessons from a heathen!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.377 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_375 # I'll become Zealous and turn against this heathen!
		
		piety = 50
		add_trait = zealous
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.378 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
}

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion

		prestige = 25
		piety = -50
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If having faith is good, it is good to be proud of your faith! - lose Humble/gain Proud
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.379
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_379
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_379 # I should be proud of my faith!
		
		prestige = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = humble
			}
			remove_trait = humble
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.380 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = proud
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.381 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang lost Humble

# I don't think my teacher is very good - confront them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.382
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_382
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_382 # No, this is probably a "me" problem...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_382 # My teacher is the problem!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.383 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.383
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_383
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_383 # My bad!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.384 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_383 # You're just being a poor student!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		piety = -10
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.385 days = 1 } # Student gets rebuke
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_383 # I just can't do it!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.386 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher is sorry
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.384
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_384
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_384 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_384 # "Sorry" won't cut it!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.387 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher blames me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.385
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_385
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_385 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_385 # That's it! This ends now!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.387 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher tells me they simply can't do it
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.386
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_386
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_386 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.387
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_387
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_387 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# I'm simply not feeling it - stop?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.388
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_388
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_388 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_388 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.389 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.389
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_389
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_389 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This zeal thing seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.390
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_390
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_390 # My faith is strong!
		
		add_trait = zealous
		
		piety = 25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.391 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is Zealous
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.391
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_391
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_391 # That's great!
		
		prestige = 25
		piety = 25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might discover that it isn't going anywhere - ping Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.392
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.393 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.393
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_393
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_393 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.395 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_393 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.394 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.394
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_394
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_394 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.395
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.370 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "chastity" (Lustful)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about chastity
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.396
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_396
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_396 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.397 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.397
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = chaste
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Chaste and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.398 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = celibate
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Celibate and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.402 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = chaste
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.406 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.412 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = lustful # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = chaste
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Lustful
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.414 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.416 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.397 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.397 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Chaste and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.398
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_398
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_398 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = chaste
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.399 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.400 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.397 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_398 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.401 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Chaste
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.399
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_399
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_399 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

# I am Celibate and really wonder why we're having this lesson

					factor = 2

				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}

				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.406
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_406
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_406 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.407 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.407
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_407
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_407 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.408 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_407 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.409 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_407 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.410 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.408
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_408
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_408 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.409
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_409
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_409 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.397 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_409 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.411 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Teacher says I'm ungrateful and refuses to teach me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.410
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_410
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_410 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang saw through your lie
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.411
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_411
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_411 # I see...
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		prestige = -50
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# I'm simply not feeling it - stop?

	id = hwarang.412
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_412
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_412 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.397 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_412 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.413 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.417 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

	}

### Spiritual guidance - "temperance" (Gluttonous)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about temperance
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.420
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_420
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_420 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.421 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.421
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = temperate
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Temperate and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.422 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = temperate
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.426 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.432 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = gluttonous # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = temperate
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Gluttonous
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.434 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.436 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.421 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.421 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Temperate and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.422
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_422
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_422 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = temperate
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.423 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.424 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.421 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_422 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.425 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.427
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_427
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_427 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.428 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_427 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.429 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_427 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.430 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.429
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_429
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_429 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.421 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_429 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.431 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.434
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_434
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_434 # I'm sure this is for the best!
		
		add_trait = gluttonous
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.435 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is Gluttonous
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.435
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_435
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_435 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 25
		piety = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might discover that it isn't going anywhere - ping Hwarang

	id = hwarang.436
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.437 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.437
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_437
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_437 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.439 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_437 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.438 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.438
