			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.439
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.421 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "charity" (Greedy)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about charity
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.440
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_440
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_440 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.441 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.441
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = charitable
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Charitable and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.442 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = charitable
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.446 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.452 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = greedy # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = charitable
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Greedy
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.454 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.456 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.441 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.441 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Charitable and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.442
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_442
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_442 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = charitable
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.443 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.444 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.441 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_442 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.445 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.446
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_446
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_446 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.447 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.447
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_447
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_447 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.448 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_447 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.449 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_447 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.450 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.448
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_448
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_448 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.449
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_449
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_449 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.441 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_449 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.451 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.441 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "diligence" (Slothful)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about diligence
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.460
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_460
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_460 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.461 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.461
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = diligent
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Diligent and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.462 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = content
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more content
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.466 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more patient
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.469 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = diligent
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.472 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.478 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = diligent
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Slothful
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.480 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.482 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.461 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.461 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Diligent and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.462
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_462
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_462 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = diligent
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.463 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.464 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.461 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_462 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.465 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Diligent

	id = hwarang.463
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_463
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_463 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.465
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_465
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_465 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I'm to work less hard, should I not also want less? - lose Ambitious/gain Content
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.466
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_466
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_466 # I can set smaller goals!
		
		prestige = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = ambitious
			}
			remove_trait = ambitious
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.467 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = content
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.468 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.461 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.472
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_472
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {

		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.473 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.473
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_473
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_473 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.474 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_473 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.475 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_473 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.476 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.474
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_474
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_474 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.475
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_475
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_475 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.461 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_475 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.477 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Teacher says I'm ungrateful and refuses to teach me

	id = hwarang.476
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_476

		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}

		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_478 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.479 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}

				trait = diligent

				factor = 10

			}

	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.484
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_484
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_484 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.485
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.485 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "patience" (Wroth)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about patience
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.486
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_486
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_486 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.487 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.487
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = patient
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Patient and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.488 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = diligent
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more diligent
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.492 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.495 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.501 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = wroth # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Wroth
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.503 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.505 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.487 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.487 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Patient and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.488
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_488
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_488 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = patient
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.489 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.490 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.487 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_488 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.491 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Patient

	id = hwarang.489

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_489 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further

	id = hwarang.491
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_491
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_491 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If it is possible to be overly patient, should I not work harder? - lose Slothful/gain Diligent
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.492
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_492
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_492 # I can work harder!
		
		piety = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = slothful
			}
			remove_trait = slothful
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.493 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = diligent
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.494 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.487 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang lost Slothful

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.495
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_495
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_495 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.496 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.496
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_496
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_496 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.497 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_496 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.498 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_496 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.499 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.497
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_497
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_497 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.498
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_498
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_498 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.487 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_498 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.500 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

				trait = wroth

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about kindness

	id = hwarang.509
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_509
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_509 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.510 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.510
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = kind
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Kind and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.511 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = just
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more just
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.515 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = ambitious
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more ambitious
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.518 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.521 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.527 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = envious # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = kind
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Envious
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.529 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.531 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.510 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.510 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Kind and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.511
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_511
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_511 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = kind
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.512 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.513 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.510 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_511 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.514 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.514
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_514
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_514 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I can't be kind all the time, I can at least be just - lose Arbitrary/gain Just
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.515
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_515
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_515 # I can be Lawful even if I'm less Good!
		
		prestige = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = arbitrary
			}
			remove_trait = arbitrary
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.516 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = just
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_just
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_just
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.517 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.510 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.521
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_521
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_521 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.522 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.522
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_522
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_522 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.523 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_522 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.524 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_522 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.525 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.523
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_523
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_523 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.524
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_524
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_524 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.510 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_524 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.526 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Teacher says I'm ungrateful and refuses to teach me

	id = hwarang.525
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_525

		}

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.534
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.510 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "humility" (Proud)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about humility
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.535
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_535
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_535 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.536
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = humble
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Humble and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.537 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = content
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more content
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.541 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = humble
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Humble again
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.544 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.546 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.552 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = proud # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = humble
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Proud
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.554 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.556 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Humble and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.537
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_537
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_537 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = humble
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.538 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.539 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_537 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.540 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Humble

	id = hwarang.538

	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_538 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is trying their best but hasn't lost Humble

	id = hwarang.539
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_539
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_539 # I see...
		
		prestige = -5
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.540
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_540
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_540 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I take humility too far, should I not be proud of what I have? - lose Ambitious/gain Content
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.541
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_541
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_541 # I should be more content!
		
		prestige = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = ambitious
			}
			remove_trait = ambitious
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.542 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = content
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.543 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang lost Ambitious

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_544 # Best not think too much of it...

		add_trait = humble
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
			}

			character_event = { id = hwarang.545 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.546
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_546
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {

		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.547 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.547
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_547
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_547 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.548 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_547 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.549 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_547 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.550 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.548
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_548
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_548 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.549
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_549
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_549 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_549 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.551 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Teacher says I'm ungrateful and refuses to teach me
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.550
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_550
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_550 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang saw through your lie

					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}

							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}

							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}

		}

		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}

				factor = 10

			}
		}
	}

	id = hwarang.558
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_558
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_558 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.559
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.536 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "justice" (Arbitrary)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about justice
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.560
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_560
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_560 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.561 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.561
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = just
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Just and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.562 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = envious
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = kind
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more kind
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.566 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = cynical
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more cynical
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.569 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.572 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.578 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = arbitrary # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = just
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Arbitrary
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.580 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.582 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.561 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.561 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Just and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.562
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_562
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_562 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = just
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.563 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.564 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.561 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_562 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.565 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = hwarang.565
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_565
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_565 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I can't always be Lawful, I should always be Good - lose Cruel/gain Kind
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.566
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_566
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_566 # I should be Good if I can't be Lawful!
		
		prestige = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = cruel
			}
			remove_trait = cruel
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.567 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = kind

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.568 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.561 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.573
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_573
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_573 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.574 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_573 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.575 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_573 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.576 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.574
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_574
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_574 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.575
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_575
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_575 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.561 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_575 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.577 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

		}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.584
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_584
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_584 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.585
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.561 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "bravery" (Craven)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about bravery
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.586
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_586
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_586 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.587 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.587
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = brave
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Brave and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.588 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more paranoid
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.592 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.595 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.601 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = craven # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = brave
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Craven
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.603 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.605 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.587 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.587 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Brave and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.588
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_588
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_588 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = brave
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.589 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.590 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.587 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_588 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.591 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Brave

	id = hwarang.589

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_589 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_591
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_591 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I'm brave in an unsuitable way, maybe that's because I trust too much? - lose Trusting/gain Paranoid
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.592
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_592
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_592 # I should be Good if I can't be Lawful!
		
		prestige = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = trusting
			}
			remove_trait = trusting
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.593 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = paranoid
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.594 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.587 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.595
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_595
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_595 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.596 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.596
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_596
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_596 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.597 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_596 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.598 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_596 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.599 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.597
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_597
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_597 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.598
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_598
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_598 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.587 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_598 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.600 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Teacher says I'm ungrateful and refuses to teach me

	id = hwarang.599
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_599

		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "kindness" (Cruel)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about kindness
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.609
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_609
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_609 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.610 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.610
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = kind
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Kind and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.611 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.615 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.621 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = cruel # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = kind
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Cruel
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.623 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.625 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.610 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.610 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Kind and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.611
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_611
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_611 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = kind
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.612 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.613 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.610 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_611 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.614 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
