	id = hwarang.614
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_614
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_614 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.615
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_615
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_615 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.616 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.616
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_616
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_616 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.617 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_616 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.618 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_616 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.619 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.617
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_617
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_617 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.618
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_618
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_618 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.610 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_618 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.620 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.630
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = zealous
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Zealous and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.631 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = humble
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more humble
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.635 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.638 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.644 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = cynical # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = zealous
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Cynical
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.646 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.648 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.630 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.630 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Zealous and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.631
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_631
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_631 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = zealous
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.632 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.633 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.630 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_631 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.634 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Zealous

	id = hwarang.634
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_634
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_634 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If my approach to my faith is wrong, does that mean I am too proud? - lose Proud/gain Humble
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.635
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_635
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_635 # I should not be as proud of my approach to amy faith!
		
		piety = 10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = proud
			}
			remove_trait = proud
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.636 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = humble
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.637 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.610 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang lost Proud

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.638
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_638
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_638 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.639 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.639
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_639
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_639 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.640 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_639 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.641 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_639 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.642 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.640
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_640
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_640 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.641
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_641
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_641 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.630 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_641 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.643 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

		}
	}
}

		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}

				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}

				factor = 10
				trait = zealous

		}

			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}

### Spiritual guidance - "honesty" (Deceitful)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about honesty
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.652
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_652
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_652 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.653 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.653
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = zealous
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Zealous and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.654 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more paranoid
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.658 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.661 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.667 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = deceitful # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = honest
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Deceitful
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.669 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.671 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.653 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.653 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Honest and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.654
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_654
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_654 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = honest
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.655 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.656 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.653 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_654 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.657 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Honest

	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_657 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If I am too honest, does that mean I should be more careful about the people I tell things? - lose Trusting/gain Paranoid
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.658
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_658
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_658 # Who can I really trust?
		
		prestige = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = trusting
			}
			remove_trait = trusting
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.659 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = paranoid
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.660 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.653 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect

	id = hwarang.661
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_661
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_661 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.662 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.662
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_662
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_662 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.663 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_662 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.664 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_662 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.665 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.663
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_663
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_663 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.664
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_664
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_664 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.653 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_664 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.666 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "trust" (Paranoid)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about trust
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.675
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_675
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_675 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.676 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.676
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = cynical
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes more cynical
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.677 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = trusting
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								any_friend = {
									NOT = {
										character = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM ends a friendship
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.680 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.683 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.1
						FROM = {
							trait = trusting
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Paranoid
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.685 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.687 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.676 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.676 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# If I trust too much, does that mean I trust my faith too much? - lose Zealous/gain Cynical
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.677
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_677
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_677 # Maybe the priests aren't trustworthy?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			remove_trait = zealous
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.678 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = cynical
			FROM = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.679 } # Inform teacher
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.676 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang lost Zealous

# My friend isn't really my friend...
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.680
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_680
	picture = GFX_evt_shadow
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_friend = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = friend_to_remove
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_680 # We are no longer friends!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.681 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		event_target:friend_to_remove = {
			remove_friend = ROOT
			character_event = { id = hwarang.682 } # Inform former friend
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.676 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang ended a friendship
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.681
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_681
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_681 # I see...
	}
}

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

	}

# I'm simply not feeling it - stop?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.683
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_683
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_683 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.676 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_683 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.684 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang decided to opt out of being taught anything further
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.684
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_684
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_684 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# This seems right... right?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.685
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_685
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_685 # I'm sure this is for the best!
		
		add_trait = paranoid
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.686 } # Inform teacher!
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher Hwarang is Paranoid
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.686
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_686
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_686 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 25
		piety = -25
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might discover that it isn't going anywhere - ping Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.687
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.688 } # Teacher gets actual event
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.688
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_688
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_688 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.690 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_688 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.689 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.689
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_689
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_689 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.690
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.676 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - "gregariousness" (Shy)

# Inform Hwarang that they'll be taught about gregariousness
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.691
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_691
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_691 # Sounds fair!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.692 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to teacher
		}
	}
}

# Looping progress event
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.692
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				FROM = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = gregarious
							}
						}
					}
					# FROM is Gregarious and might reconsider lessons
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.693 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						FROM = {
							trait = paranoid
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 10
						is_dumb_trigger = yes
					}
					# FROM thinks their teacher is up to no good
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.697 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# FROM is having doubts
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.703 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 1000
						FROM = {
							trait = shy # If we pick it up elsewhere, immediately go here!
						}
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						FROM = {
							trait = gregarious
						}
					}
					# FROM becomes Shy
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.705 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						trait = slothful
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 2
						FROM = {
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
					# Teacher might think it is going nowhere
					FROM = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.707 }
					}
				}
				10 = {
					# Nothing - loop back!
					repeat_event = { id = hwarang.692 days = 30 random = 30 }
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					is_alive = yes
					society_member_of = hwarang
				}
			}
			repeat_event = { id = hwarang.692 days = 30 random = 30 } # Try again
		}
	}
}

# I am Gregarious and really wonder why we're having this lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.693
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_693
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_693 # It is for the best...
		
		piety = 5
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = humble
				}
				remove_trait = gregarious
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.694 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = slothful
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = stubborn
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					trait = proud
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.695 } # Inform teacher
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.692 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = patient
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_693 # No, I can't do this...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.696 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher about Hwarang losing Gregarious
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.694
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_694
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_694 # Just as planned!
		
		prestige = 10
	}
}

	}
}

# My teacher is highly suspect
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.697
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_697
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_697 # Something is not right!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.698 days = 1 } # Confront teacher
		}
	}
}

# Teacher confronted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.698
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_698
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_698 # So what if I lied?
		
		piety = -10
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.699 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = honest
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_698 # I assure you I mean well!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.700 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = deceitful
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_698 # Fine; we'll stop!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.701 days = 1 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = slothful
			}
		}
	}
}

# Teacher admits decepton
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.699
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_699
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_699 # Then this ends now!
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher assures me everything is okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.700
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_700
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_700 # Let's keep at it...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.692 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_700 # You LIE!
		
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_friend = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				add_rival = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				remove_friend = ROOT
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.702 } # Inform teacher
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Teacher says I'm ungrateful and refuses to teach me

	id = hwarang.701
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_701
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

			who = FROM

		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher that Hwarang saw through your lie

	id = hwarang.702
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_702
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		prestige = -50
		
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# Teacher might interrupt lessons early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.708
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_708
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_708 # Let's keep at it...
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.710 } # Ping student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_708 # This won't go anywhere!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.709 } # Inform student
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = patient
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
}

# Inform Hwarang the lessons ended early
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.709
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_709
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_709 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

# If the lessons didn't end early, ping the Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.710
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.692 days = 30 random = 30 } # Back to the loop
		}
	}
}

### Spiritual guidance - no lesson

# Inform Hwarang there won't be a lesson
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.711
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_711
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_711 # I see...
		
		reverse_remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
		}
		remove_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
		}
	}
}

### Cash out

# Confirmation event - AI always confirms
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.712
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_712
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = hwarang_cash_out
			value = 0
		}
		export_to_variable = {
			which = hwarang_cash_out
			value = society_currency
			who = ROOT
		}
		multiply_variable = {
			which = hwarang_cash_out
			value = 0.25
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_712 # Yes, I want to cash out!
		
		any_player = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
				NOT = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.713 } # Inform players
		}

		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_cash_out_reward
			hwarang_cash_out_effect = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
			}
			set_character_flag = hwarang_ai_leave
		}
		else = {
			set_character_flag = hwarang_player_leave
		}
		leave_society = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_712 # No, I don't think so
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0 # The AI always confirms
		}
	}
	
	after = {
		set_variable = {
			which = hwarang_cash_out
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

# Inform non-AI members
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.713
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_713
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_713 # I see...
	}
}

### Inspire Loyalty

# FROMFROM inspired loyalty in ROOT - does anything further happen?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.714
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		# Clear flags
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_friendship
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_end_rivalry
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_less_ambitious
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_abandon_claim
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_chaste
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_temperate
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_charitable
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_patient
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_kind
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_humble
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_zealous
		clr_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_just
		# See if anything further can happen
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						any_rival = {
							character = FROMFROM
						}
						any_friend = {
							character = FROMFROM
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						opinion = {
							who = FROMFROM
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				# Possible friendship
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_friendship
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						any_rival = {
							character = FROMFROM
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						opinion = {
							who = FROMFROM
							value = -50
						}
					}
				}
				# Possible end to rivalry
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_end_rivalry
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = content
				}
				# Possibly less ambitious
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_less_ambitious
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						FROMFROM = {
							any_demesne_title = {
								lower_tier_than = PREV
								claimed_by = ROOT
								NOT = {
									higher_tier_than = ROOT
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				# Might abandon claim
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_abandon_claim
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = chaste
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = lustful
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = chaste
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = lustful
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = lustful
					}
				}
				# Picked up virtue - chaste
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_chaste
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = temperate
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = gluttonous
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = temperate
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = gluttonous
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = gluttonous
					}
				}
				# Picked up virtue - temperate
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_temperate
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = charitable
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = greedy
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = charitable
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = greedy
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = greedy
					}
				}
				# Picked up virtue - charitable
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_charitable
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = diligent 
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = slothful
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = diligent 
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = slothful
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = slothful
					}
				}
				# Picked up virtue - diligent 
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_diligent 
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = patient
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = wroth
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = wroth
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = wroth
					}
				}
				# Picked up virtue - patient
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_patient
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = kind
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOR = {
						trait = envious
						trait = cruel
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = kind
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = envious
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = envious
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = cruel
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = cruel
					}
				}
				# Picked up virtue - kind
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_kind
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = humble
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = proud
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = humble
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = proud
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = proud
					}
				}
				# Picked up virtue - humble
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_humble
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = cynical
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = zealous
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = cynical
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = cynical
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						religion = FROMFROM
					}
				}
				# Became more zealous if it makes sense
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_zealous
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = just
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = arbitrary
					}
					FROMFROM = {
						NOT = {
							trait = just
						}
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = arbitrary
					FROMFROM = {
						trait = arbitrary
					}
				}
				# Became more just
				set_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_just
			}
			50 = {
				# Nothing
			}
		}
		character_event = { id = hwarang.715 } # Inform ROOT
	}
}

# ROOT informed, might have an idea to do more
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.715
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_715
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_abandon_claim
			}
			FROMFROMFROM = {
				random_demesne_title = {
					limit = {
						lower_tier_than = PREV
						claimed_by = ROOT
						NOT = {
							higher_tier_than = ROOT
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = claim_to_abandon
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_friendship
		}
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_715 # Maybe we should be friends?
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.716 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = shy
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_end_rivalry
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_715 # Maybe we should stop being rivals?
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.719 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cruel
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_less_ambitious
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_715 # Maybe I shouldn't be so ambitious...
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = ambitious
			}
			remove_trait = ambitious
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = content
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.722 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_abandon_claim
		}
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_715 # Maybe I should give up that claim...
		
		event_target:claim_to_abandon = {
			remove_claim = ROOT
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.723 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROMFROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_chaste
		}
		name = EVTOPTE_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more chaste!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = lustful
			}
			remove_trait = lustful
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = chaste
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.724 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = chaste
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = lustful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_temperate
		}
		name = EVTOPTF_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more temperate!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = gluttonous
			}
			remove_trait = gluttonous
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = temperate
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.725 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = temperate
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = gluttonous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_charitable
		}
		name = EVTOPTG_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more charitable!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = greedy
			}
			remove_trait = greedy
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = charitable
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.726 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = charitable
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = greedy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_diligent
		}
		name = EVTOPTH_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more diligent!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = slothful
			}
			remove_trait = slothful
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = diligent
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.727 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = diligent
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_patient
		}
		name = EVTOPTI_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more patient!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = wroth
			}
			remove_trait = wroth
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = patient
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.728 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = patient
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_kind
		}
		name = EVTOPTJ_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more kind!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					trait = envious
					trait = cruel
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = envious
						}
					}
					remove_trait = envious
				}
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
					remove_trait = cruel
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = kind

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.729 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = kind
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cruel
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_virtue_humble
		}
		name = EVTOPTK_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more humble!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = proud
			}
			remove_trait = proud
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = humble
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.730 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = humble
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_zealous
		}
		name = EVTOPTL_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more zealous!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = cynical
			}
			remove_trait = cynical
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = zealous
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.731 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = zealous
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_character_flag = inspire_loyalty_just
		}
		name = EVTOPTM_HWARANG_715 # My liege has inspired me to be more just!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = arbitrary
			}
			remove_trait = arbitrary
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = just
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_just
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_just
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.732 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROMFROMFROM = {
					NOT = {
						trait = just
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = arbitrary
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTN_HWARANG_715 # I don't feel like doing anything...
		
		piety = -50
		
		FROMFROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.733 days = 2 random = 2 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				any_friend = {
					character = FROMFROMFROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Friendship offered
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.716
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_716
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_716 # Sure!
		
		add_friend = FROM
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.717 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_716 # I don't think so...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.718 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			character_event = { id = hwarang.720 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = -50
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_719 # I don't think so...

			character_event = { id = hwarang.721 } # Inform FROM

### Self-reflection - setup

# AI shortcut
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.734
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		# AI picks at random, but prefers to get rid of bad traits
		random_list = {
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = lustful
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.742 } # Chastity
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = gluttonous
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.762 } # Temperance
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = greedy
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.782 } # Charity
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = slothful
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.802 } # Diligence
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = wroth
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.822 } # Patience
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = envious
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = cruel
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.842 } # Kindness
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = proud
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.862 } # Humility
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = craven
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.882 } # Bravery
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = ambitious
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.902 } # Contentness
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = shy
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.922 } # Gregariousness
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = deceitful
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.942 } # Honesty
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = arbitrary
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.962 } # Justice
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = paranoid
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.982 } # Trust
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = cynical
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1002 } # Zeal
			}
		}
	}
}

# What do you want to improve?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.735
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_735
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NAND = {
				trait = chaste
				trait = temperate
				trait = charitable
				trait = diligent
				trait = patient
				trait = kind
				trait = humble
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_735 # I want to become more virtuous!
		character_event = { id = hwarang.736 } # Virtues
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NAND = {
				trait = brave
				trait = content
				trait = gregarious
				trait = honest
				trait = just
				trait = trusting
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_735 # Something else!
		character_event = { id = hwarang.739 } # Other traits
	}
}

# A virtue - direct option for humility
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.736
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_736
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NAND = {
				trait = chaste
				trait = temperate
				trait = charitable
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_736 # Group 1
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.737 } # Pick something
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NAND = {
				trait = diligent
				trait = patient
				trait = kind
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_736 # Group 2
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.738 } # Pick something
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = humble
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_736 # Humility
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.862 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_736 # Go back!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.735 }
	}
}

# Honesty/justice/trust
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.741
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_741
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = honest
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_741 # Honesty
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.942 }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = just
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_741 # Justice
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.962 }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = trusting
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_741 # Trust
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.982 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_741 # Go back!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.739 }
	}
}

### Self-reflection - chastity

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.742
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_742
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = chaste
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = chaste
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_742 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.743 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.744 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.745 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.746 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.747 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.748 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_742 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.749 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_742 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.753 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_742 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.754 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.755 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.756 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.757 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.758 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.743
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_743
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_743 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = lustful
			}
			remove_trait = lustful
			character_event = { id = hwarang.759 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = chaste
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Help from a friend - friend approached

	id = hwarang.749
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_749
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_749 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.750 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.751 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.752 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.758
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_758
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_758# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.759 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.759
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = chaste
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.760 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.761 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.759 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.760
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_760
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_760 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.742 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_760 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.761
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_761
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_761 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - temperance

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.762
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_762
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = temperate
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = temperate
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_762 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.763 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.764 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.765 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.766 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.767 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.768 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_762 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.769 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_762 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.773 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_762 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.774 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.775 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.776 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.777 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.778 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.763
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_763
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_763 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = gluttonous
			}
			remove_trait = gluttonous
			character_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = temperate
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
