character_event = {
	id = hwarang.767
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_767
	picture = GFX_evt_stressed_ruler
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_767 # Curses!
		
		piety = -5
		character_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Meditation goes poorly - lose some society currency
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.768
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_768
	picture = GFX_evt_stressed_ruler
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_768 # Curses!
		
		detract_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		character_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Help from a friend - friend approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.769
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_769
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_769 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.770 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.771 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.772 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Friend helps you - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.770
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_770
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_770 # Great!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = gluttonous
			}
			remove_trait = gluttonous
			character_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = temperate
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Friend tries to help you but it doesn't work out - gain some piety

	id = hwarang.771
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_771
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_771 # That went okay!
		
		piety = 5
		character_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Help from a temple - visit unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.777
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_777
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_777 # That did nothing...		
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.778
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_778
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_778# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.779
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = temperate
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.780 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.781 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.779 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.780
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_780
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_780 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.762 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_780 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.781
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_781
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_781 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - charity

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.782
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_782
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = charitable
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = charitable
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_782 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.783 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.784 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.785 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.786 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.787 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.788 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_782 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.789 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_782 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.793 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_782 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.794 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.795 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.796 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.797 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.798 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.783
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_783
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_783 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = greedy
			}
			remove_trait = greedy
			character_event = { id = hwarang.799 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = charitable
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Help from a temple - visit unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.797
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_797
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_797 # That did nothing...		
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.799 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.798
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_798
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_798# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.799 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.799
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = charitable
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.800 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.801 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.799 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.800
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_800
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_800 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.782 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_800 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.801
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_801
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_801 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - diligence

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.802
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_802
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = diligent
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = diligent
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_802 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.803 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.804 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.805 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.806 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.807 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.808 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_802 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.809 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_802 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.813 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_802 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.814 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.815 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.816 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.817 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.818 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.803
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_803
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_803 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = slothful
			}
			remove_trait = slothful
			character_event = { id = hwarang.819 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = diligent
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes reasonably well - gain some piety

	id = hwarang.804

# Help from a friend - friend approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.809
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_809
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_809 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.810 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.811 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.812 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = diligent
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.820 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.821 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.819 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

### Self-reflection - patience

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.822
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_822
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = patient
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = patient
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_822 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.823 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.824 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.825 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.826 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.827 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.828 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_822 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.829 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_822 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.833 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_822 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.834 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.835 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.836 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.837 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.838 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.823
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_823
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_823 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = wroth
			}
			remove_trait = wroth
			character_event = { id = hwarang.839 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = patient
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Help from a friend - friend approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.829
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_829
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_829 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.830 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.831 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.832 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.838
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_838
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_838# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.839 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.839
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = patient
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.840 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.841 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.839 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.840
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_840
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_840 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.822 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_840 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.841
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_841
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_841 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - kindness

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.842
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_842
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = kind
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = kind
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_842 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.843 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.844 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.845 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.846 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.847 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.848 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_842 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.849 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_842 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.853 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_842 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.854 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.855 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.856 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.857 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.858 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.843
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_843
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_843 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					trait = cruel
					trait = envious
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
					remove_trait = cruel
				}
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = envious
						}
					}
					remove_trait = envious
				}
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = kind

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_851 # That went okay!
		
		piety = 5
		character_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Friend tries to help you but it doesn't work out - gain some society currency
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.852
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_852
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_852 # That went okay!
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		character_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Help from the Hwarang as a whole - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.853
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_853
	picture = GFX_evt_china_invades
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_853 # Great!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					trait = cruel
					trait = envious
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
					remove_trait = cruel
				}
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = envious
						}
					}
					remove_trait = envious
				}
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = kind

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Help from a temple - you get a lot of help - move one step closer to the target

	id = hwarang.854
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_854
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_854 # Great!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					trait = cruel
					trait = envious
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
					remove_trait = cruel
				}
				50 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						NOT = {
							trait = envious
						}
					}
					remove_trait = envious
				}
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = kind

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}

	}

# Help from a temple - visit unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.857
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_857
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_857 # That did nothing...		
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.858
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_858
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_858# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.859
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = kind
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.860 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.861 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.859 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.860
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_860
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_860 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.842 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_860 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.861
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_861
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_861 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - humility

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.862
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_862
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = humble
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = humble
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_862 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.863 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.864 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.865 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.866 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.867 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.868 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_862 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.869 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_862 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.873 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_862 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.874 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.875 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.876 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.877 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.878 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.863
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_863
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_863 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = proud
			}
			remove_trait = proud
			character_event = { id = hwarang.879 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = humble
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Help from a friend - friend approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.869
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_869
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_869 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.870 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.871 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.872 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Friend helps you - move one step closer to the target

	id = hwarang.870

			}
		}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.879
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = humble
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.880 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.881 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.879 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.880
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_880
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_880 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.862 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_880 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain

	id = hwarang.881

### Self-reflection - bravery

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.882
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_882
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = brave
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = brave
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_882 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.883 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.884 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.885 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.886 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.887 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.888 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_882 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.889 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_882 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.893 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_882 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.894 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.895 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.896 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.897 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.898 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.883
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_883
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_883 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = craven
			}
			remove_trait = craven
			character_event = { id = hwarang.899 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = brave
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_brave
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_brave
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes reasonably well - gain some piety

	id = hwarang.884
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_884

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		character_event = { id = hwarang.899 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue

# Help from a friend - friend approached

	id = hwarang.889
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_889
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_889 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.890 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.891 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.892 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.898
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_898
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_898# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.899 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.899
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = brave
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.900 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.901 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.899 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.900
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_900
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_900 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.882 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_900 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

### Self-reflection - contentness

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.902
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_902
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = content
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = content
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_902 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.903 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.904 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.905 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.906 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.907 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.908 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_902 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.909 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_902 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.913 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_902 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.914 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.915 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.916 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.917 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.918 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.903
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_903
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_903 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = ambitious
			}
			remove_trait = ambitious
			character_event = { id = hwarang.919 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = content
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_905 # That went okay!
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		character_event = { id = hwarang.919 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Meditation is uneventful

# Help from a friend - friend approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.909
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_909
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_909 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.910 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.911 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.912 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Friend helps you - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.910
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_910
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_910 # Great!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = ambitious
			}
			remove_trait = ambitious
			character_event = { id = hwarang.919 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = content
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_content
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Friend tries to help you but it doesn't work out - gain some piety

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.918
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_918
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_918# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.919 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.919
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = content
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.920 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.921 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.919 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.920
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_920
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_920 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.902 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_920 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.921
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_921
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_921 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - gregariousness

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.922
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_922
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = gregarious
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = gregarious
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_922 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.923 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.924 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.925 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.926 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.927 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.928 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_922 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.929 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_922 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.933 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_922 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.934 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.935 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.936 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.937 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.938 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.923
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_923
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_923 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = shy
			}
			remove_trait = shy
			character_event = { id = hwarang.939 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = gregarious
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_935 # That went okay!
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		character_event = { id = hwarang.939 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Help from a temple - you get a little help - gain some society currency
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.936
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_936
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_936 # That went okay!
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		character_event = { id = hwarang.939 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Help from a temple - visit unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.937
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_937
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_937 # That did nothing...		
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.939 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.938
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_938
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_938# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.939 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.939
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = gregarious
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.940 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.941 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.939 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.940
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_940
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_940 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.922 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_940 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.941
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_941
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_941 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - honesty

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.942
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_942
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = honest
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = honest
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_942 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.943 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.944 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.945 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.946 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.947 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.948 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_942 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.949 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_942 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.953 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_942 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.954 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.955 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.956 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.957 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.958 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.943
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_943
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_943 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = deceitful
			}
			remove_trait = deceitful
			character_event = { id = hwarang.959 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = honest
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_honest
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_honest
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes reasonably well - gain some piety

# Help from a friend - friend approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.949
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_949
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_949 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.950 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.951 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.952 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.959
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = honest
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.960 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.961 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.959 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.960
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_960
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_960 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.942 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_960 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

### Self-reflection - justice

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.962
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_962
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = just
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = just
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_962 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.963 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.964 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.965 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.966 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.967 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.968 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_962 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.969 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_962 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.973 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_962 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.974 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.975 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.976 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.977 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.978 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.963
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_963
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_963 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = arbitrary
			}
			remove_trait = arbitrary
			character_event = { id = hwarang.979 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = just
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_just
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_just
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Help from a friend - friend approached

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_969 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.970 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.971 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.972 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.978
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_978
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_978# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.979 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.979
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = just
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.980 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.981 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.979 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.980
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_980
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_980 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.962 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_980 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.981
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_981
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_981 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - trust

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.982
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_982
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = trusting
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					trait = trusting
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_982 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.983 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.984 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.985 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.986 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.987 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.988 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_982 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.989 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_982 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.993 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_982 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.994 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.995 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.996 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.997 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.998 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.983
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_983
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_983 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
			remove_trait = paranoid
			character_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = trusting
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = hwarang.991
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_991
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_991 # That went okay!
		
		piety = 5
		character_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Friend tries to help you but it doesn't work out - gain some society currency
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.992
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_992
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_992 # That went okay!
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		character_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Help from the Hwarang as a whole - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.993
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_993
	picture = GFX_evt_china_invades
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_993 # Great!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
			remove_trait = paranoid
			character_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = trusting
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

# Help from a temple - you get a lot of help - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.994
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_994
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_994 # Great!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
			remove_trait = paranoid
			character_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = trusting
		
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				}
				clr_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
				add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
