# Help from a temple - visit unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.997
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_997
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_997 # That did nothing...		
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Visit worse than unhelpful
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.998
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_998
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_998# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.999
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = trusting
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1000 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1001 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.999 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1000
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1000
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1000 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.982 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1000 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1001
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1001
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1001 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Self-reflection - zeal

# How do I want to do this?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1002
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1002
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clear_event_target = hwarang_self_reflection_help
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_friend = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					religion = ROOT
					trait = zealous
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_friend = {
				limit = {
					society_member_of = hwarang
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
					religion = ROOT
					trait = zealous
					NOT = {
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = ROOT
							modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_self_reflection_help
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1002 # I'll meditate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1003 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes well
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1004 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1005 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes okay - society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1006 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation does nothing
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1007 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1008 days = 15 random = 15 } # Meditation goes poorly - society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1002 # I'll ask a friend!
		
		event_target:hwarang_self_reflection_help = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = helped_with_hwarang_self_reflection
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1009 } # Inform friend
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			has_society_currency_medium_trigger = yes
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1002 # I'll ask the Hwarang!
		
		detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1013 days = 15 random = 15 } # You got help from the Hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_1002 # I'll visit a temple
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1014 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes well
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1015 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - piety
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1016 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes okay - society currency
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1017 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit uneventful
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1018 days = 15 random = 15 } # Visit goes very poorly
			}
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes well - move one step closer to the target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1003
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1003
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1003 # Great!
		
		piety = 25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = cynical
			}
			remove_trait = cynical
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1019 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
		}
		else = {
			add_trait = zealous
		}
	}
}

# Meditation goes reasonably well - gain some piety

# Help from a friend - friend approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1009
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1009
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1009 # I'll help if I can!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1010 days = 15 random = 15 } # It worked
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1011 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1012 days = 15 random = 15 } # It didn't help
			}
		}
	}
}

# Friend helps you - move one step closer to the target

	id = hwarang.1010
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1010

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion

		society_member_of = hwarang

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1018# They didn't help at all!
		
		piety = -25
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = zealous
			}
			random = {
				chance = 25
				remove_trait = zealous
			}
		}
		else = {
			random = {
				chance = 25
				add_trait = cynical
			}
		}
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1019 days = 30 random = 30 } # See if we can continue
	}
}

# Hidden event to determine if we can continue
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1019
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							trait = zealous
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1020 } # Try again?
				}
				else = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1021 } # End chain
				}
			}
			else = {
				repeat_event = { id = hwarang.1019 days = 60 random = 60 } # Try again
			}
		}
	}
}

# Still want to continue?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1020
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1020
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1020 # Sure!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1002 } # Pick your approach
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1020 # I don't think so!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
}

# You gained the trait some other way - end chain
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1021
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1021
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1021 # Maybe it helped a bit?
		
		piety = 5
	}
}

### Hwarang lifestyle selection

# AI lifestyle selection
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1022
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		# Weighted random
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				add_trait = administrator
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_dumb_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = architect
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_dumb_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = duelist
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					is_strong_trigger = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_weak_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = gamer
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = gregarious
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					trait = shy
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_dumb_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			5 = {
				add_trait = hunter
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					is_strong_trigger = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_weak_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = scholar
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_dumb_trigger = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					is_smart_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = socializer
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = gregarious
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					trait = shy
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = strategist
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					is_strong_trigger = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_weak_trigger = yes
				}
			}
			10 = {
				add_trait = theologian
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					trait = zealous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					trait = cynical
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					is_dumb_trigger = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1023 # Socializer
		add_trait = socializer
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1023 # Game Master
		add_trait = gamer
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1023 # Something else
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1024 }
	}
}

### NAP

# Hwarang suggests NAP
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1027
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1027
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1027 # Sure!
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1028 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROMFROM
			modifier = in_non_aggression_pact
			months = 120
		}
		reverse_opinion = {
			who = FROMFROM
			modifier = in_non_aggression_pact
			months = 120
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = FROMFROM
					value = -25
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				opinion = {
					who = FROMFROM
					value = -50
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 # Unreliable
				FROMFROM = {
					OR = {
						has_character_modifier = truce_breaker
						has_character_modifier = alliance_breaker
						has_character_modifier = broken_non_aggression_pact_char_modifier
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROMFROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1027 # Not happening!
		
		FROMFROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1029 } # Inform FROMFROM
		}
		
		# Penalize if Hwarang and it would be unreasonable to refuse
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
				FROMFROM = {
					NOR = {
						has_character_modifier = truce_breaker
						has_character_modifier = alliance_breaker
						has_character_modifier = broken_non_aggression_pact_char_modifier
						any_rival = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROMFROM = {
						tier = count
					}
				}
				detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROMFROM = {
						tier = duke
						controls_religion = no
					}
				}
				detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
			}
			else = {
				detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROMFROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_refused_nap
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = FROMFROM
					value = 25
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				opinion = {
					who = FROMFROM
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# NAP accepted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1028
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1028
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1028 # Great!
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = in_non_aggression_pact
			months = 120
		}
		reverse_opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = in_non_aggression_pact
			months = 120
		}
	}
}

# NAP refused
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1029
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1029
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1029 # I see...
		
		# Partial refund
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					tier = count
				}
			}
			add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					tier = duke
					controls_religion = no
				}
			}
			add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_refused_nap
		}
	}
}

### Demand Leadership

# You received a demand for leadership
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1030
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1030
	picture = GFX_evt_poke_king_in_chest
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1030 # Sure!
		
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_leader_will_be_demoted
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1031 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
			}
			set_character_flag = left_hwarang
			character_event = { id = hwarang.712 } # Cash out
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				society_currency = 1000
				OR = {
					NOT = {
						opinion = {
							who = FROM
							value = 25
						}
					}
					any_rival = {
						character = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				society_currency = 1000
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1030 # I have no choice, but I'm going to remember this!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					any_rival = {
						character = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			add_rival = FROM
		}
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_leader_will_be_demoted
		}
		
		# AI does not cash out in this case
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1031 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			society_currency = 1000
			NOT = {
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1030 # How dare you!
		
		add_rival = FROM
		
		change_society_currency = -1000
		prestige = -500
		piety = -500
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1032 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			society_currency = 1000
			NOT = {
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1030 # How dare you!
		
		change_society_currency = -1000
		prestige = -500
		piety = -500
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1032 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = wroth
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
		}
	}
}

# Leader stepped aside
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1031
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1031
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1031 # Great!
		
		set_society_grandmaster = yes
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_character_flag = left_hwarang
						}
					}
				}
				# Handle potential weirdness
				if = {
					limit = {
						society_rank == 4
					}
					society_rank_down = 1
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						society_rank == 2
					}
					society_rank_up = 1
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						society_rank == 1
					}
					society_rank_up = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Leader used society influence to stay in charge

	id = hwarang.1032
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1032
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1032 # I see...
	}
}



##### Joining and misc

### Joining - player

# From on_character_ask_to_join_society
character_event = {
    id = hwarang.1033
	hide_window = yes
	
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
    trigger = {
    	FROM = { leader = { society_member_of = hwarang } }
    }
    immediate = {
    	FROM = { leader = { character_event = { id = hwarang.1034 } } }
    }
}

# Ping event
character_event = {
    id = hwarang.1034
	hide_window = yes
	
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
    immediate = {
    	FROM = { letter_event = { id = hwarang.1035 } }
    }
}

# Welcome letter
letter_event = {
    id = hwarang.1035
    desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1035
    border = GFX_event_letter_frame_war

    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = { set_character_flag = society_join_block }
	
    option = { 
        name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1035

        join_society = hwarang
		
		clr_character_flag = society_join_block
    }
}

### Joining - AI

# Make the AI join
#(fired from on_five_year_pulse)
# Root = Character
# From = Society
character_event = {
    id = hwarang.1036
    #picture = GFX_evt_battle
    #border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war
    hide_window = yes
    only_independent = yes
    has_dlc = "Holy Fury"
    
    is_triggered_only = yes

    trigger = {
        is_alive = yes
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = hwarang_disbanded
		}
    }

    immediate = {
        #Make others join a warrior lodge...
        any_realm_lord = {
            limit = {
                ai = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						culture_group = koreanic
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
					}
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
                is_in_society = no
                has_secret_religion_trait_trigger = no
                age = 12
                NOT = { block_general_event_trigger = yes }
				higher_tier_than = BARON
				NOT = { character = ROOT }
            }
            score_value = { #Prioritizes selecting some kind of warrior...
                value = 10
                warrior_recruit_score = yes # TODO: Make more appropriate?
            }
            count = 2
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_female = no
						has_religion_feature = religion_equal
						has_religion_feature = religion_matriarchal
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_adult = yes
							is_landed = yes
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 }
				}
				else = {
					save_event_target_as = hwarang_candidate
					host = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.1038 }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				random = {
					chance = 25
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_adult = yes
								is_landed = yes
							}
						}
						character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 }
					}
					else = {
						save_event_target_as = hwarang_candidate
						host = {
							character_event = { id = hwarang.1038 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
        }
		any_realm_character = {
            limit = {
                ai = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						culture_group = koreanic
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
					}
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
                is_in_society = no
                has_secret_religion_trait_trigger = no
                age = 12
                NOT = { block_general_event_trigger = yes }
            }
            score_value = { #Prioritizes selecting some kind of warrior...
                value = 10
                warrior_recruit_score = yes # TODO: Make more appropriate?
            }
            count = 1
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_female = no
						has_religion_feature = religion_equal
						has_religion_feature = religion_matriarchal
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_adult = yes
							is_landed = yes
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 }
				}
				else = {
					save_event_target_as = hwarang_candidate
					host = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.1038 }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				random = {
					chance = 25
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_adult = yes
								is_landed = yes
							}
						}
						character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 }
					}
					else = {
						save_event_target_as = hwarang_candidate
						host = {
							character_event = { id = hwarang.1038 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
        }

        #And maybe join yourself?
        if = {
            limit = {
                ai = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						culture_group = koreanic
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
					}
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
                is_in_society = no
                has_secret_religion_trait_trigger = no
                age = 12
                NOT = { block_general_event_trigger = yes }
            }
            log = "[Root.GetTitledName] joins the Hwarang!"
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_female = no
						has_religion_feature = religion_equal
						has_religion_feature = religion_matriarchal
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_adult = yes
							is_landed = yes
						}
					}
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 }
				}
				else = {
					save_event_target_as = hwarang_candidate
					host = {
						character_event = { id = hwarang.1038 }
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				random = {
					chance = 25
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								is_adult = yes
								is_landed = yes
							}
						}
						character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 }
					}
					else = {
						save_event_target_as = hwarang_candidate
						host = {
							character_event = { id = hwarang.1038 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
        }
    }
}

# Follow-up: If was eligible, AI joins Hwarang
character_event = {
    id = hwarang.1037
    hide_window = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
    immediate = {
        join_society = hwarang

        if = {
            limit = {
                NOT = {
                    society = {
                        any_society_member = {
                            is_society_grandmaster = yes
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            log = "[This.Society.GetName] is a society without a grandmaster and I am trying to be set as the grandmaster."
            set_society_grandmaster = yes # Set character as Grand Master (if there was none)
            add_society_currency_massive_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

# event_target:hwarang_candidate is an unlanded child and thus needs permission from their host
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1038
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1038
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1038 # Sure!
		
		event_target:hwarang_candidate = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 } # event_target:hwarang_candidate joins the Hwarang
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:hwarang_candidate = {
					is_female = yes
				}
				NOR = {
					is_female = yes
					any_friend = {
						character = event_target:hwarang_candidate
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = event_target:hwarang_candidate
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOR = {
					AND = {
						culture_group = koreanic
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
					}
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1038 # Maybe when you're older?
		
		event_target:hwarang_candidate = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = refused_hwarang_membership
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					AND = {
						culture_group = koreanic
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
					}
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = event_target:hwarang_candidate
					value = 50
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROM = {
					is_female = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
		}
	}
}

### Recreation if destroyed + AI rank up

# Recreation if destroyed (fired from on_society_destroyed)
character_event = {
    id = hwarang.1039
    is_triggered_only = yes
    hide_window = yes
    hide_from = yes
    
    trigger = {
        FROM = { is_society = hwarang }
    }

    immediate = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                is_landed = yes
            }
            #Pick someone under you to lead the warrior lodge...
            any_courtier_or_vassal = {
                limit = {
                    ai = yes
					OR = {
						AND = {
							culture_group = koreanic
							OR = {
								religion = buddhist
								religion = taoist
							}
						}
						religion = korean_pagan
						religion = korean_pagan_reformed
					}
                    has_secret_religion_trait_trigger = no
                    is_in_society = no
                    age = 16
                    NOT = { block_general_event_trigger = yes }
                }
                score_value = { #Prioritizes selecting some kind of warrior...
                    value = 10
                    warrior_recruit_score = yes
                    warrior_lodge_revival_selection_score = yes
                }
                join_society = FROM
                if = {
                    limit = {
                        NOT = {
                            society = {
                                any_society_member = {
                                    is_society_grandmaster = yes
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    set_society_grandmaster = yes # Set character as Grand Master
                    add_society_currency_massive_effect = yes
                }
                add_society_currency_massive_effect = yes
            }
        }
        else_if = {
			limit = {
				liege = {
					#Pick someone under your *liege* to lead the warrior lodge...
					any_courtier_or_vassal = {
						ai = yes
						OR = {
							AND = {
								culture_group = koreanic
								OR = {
									religion = buddhist
									religion = taoist
								}
							}
							religion = korean_pagan
							religion = korean_pagan_reformed
						}
						has_secret_religion_trait_trigger = no
						is_in_society = no
						age = 16
						NOT = { block_general_event_trigger = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			liege = {
				#Pick someone under your *liege* to lead the warrior lodge...
				any_courtier_or_vassal = {
					limit = {
						ai = yes
						OR = {
							AND = {
								culture_group = koreanic
								OR = {
									religion = buddhist
									religion = taoist
								}
							}
							religion = korean_pagan
							religion = korean_pagan_reformed
						}
						has_secret_religion_trait_trigger = no
						is_in_society = no
						age = 16
						NOT = { block_general_event_trigger = yes }
					}
					score_value = { #Prioritizes selecting some kind of warrior...
						value = 10
						warrior_recruit_score = yes
						warrior_lodge_revival_selection_score = yes
					}
					join_society = hwarang
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								society = {
									any_society_member = {
										is_society_grandmaster = yes
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_society_grandmaster = yes # Set character as Grand Master
						add_society_currency_massive_effect = yes
					}
				}
			}
        }
		else = { # Create a new member from scratch
			create_random_soldier = {
				age = 25
				female = no
				religion = buddhist
				culture = korean
				dynasty = random
				health = 6
				fertility = 0.8
				attributes = {
					martial = 12
					diplomacy = 8
					stewardship = 9
					intrigue = 4
					learning = 12
				}
				random_traits = yes
			}
			new_character = {
				join_society = hwarang
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							society = {
								any_society_member = {
									is_society_grandmaster = yes
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_society_grandmaster = yes # Set character as Grand Master
					add_society_currency_massive_effect = yes
				}
			}
		}
        log = "The revive event fired for [From.GetName]."
    }
}

# AI rank up
character_event = {
    id = hwarang.1040
    hide_window = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
    ai = yes
	
	is_in_society = yes
    
    trigger = { 
        society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_can_rank_up = yes
		has_society_currency_minor_trigger = yes
		is_adult = yes
    }

    immediate = {
        random_list = {
            50 = {}
            50 = {
                trigger = {
                    society_rank == 1
                }
                society_rank_up = 1
                detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes # at a worst, they are put at 0 currency
            }
            50 = {
                trigger = {
                    society_rank == 2
                }
                society_rank_up = 1
                detract_society_currency_medium_effect = yes # at a worst, they are put at 0 currency
            }
        }
    }
}



##### Missions

# Mission selection
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1041
	hide_window = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	is_in_society = yes
	only_capable = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		has_any_quest = no
		NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
		NOT = { has_character_modifier = quest_cooldown_timer }
		NOT = {
			trait = treasure_fleet_preparation
		}
		is_adult = yes
	}

	immediate = {
		random_society_member = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_society_grandmaster = yes
						NOT = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
					AND = {
						society_rank == 3
						ROOT = {
							is_society_grandmaster = yes
						}
					}
				}
				same_society_as = ROOT
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				NOT = {
					any_rival = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = hwarang_leader
		}
		
		# Mission selection
		random_list = {
			100 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = groomed
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 10
					trait = uncouth
				}
				# Become Groomed
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1042 } # Ping
				}
			}
			100 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					any_opinion_modifier_target = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								culture_group = koreanic
								OR = {
									religion = taoist
									religion = buddhist
								}
							}
							religion = korean_pagan
							religion = korean_pagan_reformed
						}
						has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = FROM
							modifier = opinion_hwarang_offering_spiritual_guidance
						}
						reverse_has_opinion_modifier = {
							who = FROM
							modifier = opinion_hwarang_receiving_spiritual_guidance
						}
					}
				}
				# Seek Spiritual Guidance
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1044 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = chaste
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = lustful
				}
				# Become Chaste
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1046 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = temperate
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = gluttonous
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = drunkard
				}
				# Become Temperate
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1048 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = charitable
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = gluttonous
				}
				# Become Charitable
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1050 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = diligent
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = slothful
				}
				# Become Diligent
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1052 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = patient
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = wroth
				}
				# Become Patient
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1054 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = kind
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = envious
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = cruel
				}
				# Become Kind
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1056 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = humble
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = proud
				}
				# Become Humble
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1058 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = brave
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = craven
				}
				# Become Brave
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1060 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = content
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = ambitious
				}
				# Become Content
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1062 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = gregarious
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = shy
				}
				# Become Gregarious
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1064 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = honest
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = deceitful
				}
				# Become Honest
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1066 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = just
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = arbitrary
				}
				# Become Just
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1068 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = trusting
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					trait = paranoid
				}
				# Become Trusting
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1070 } # Ping
				}
			}
			# You're never asked to become Zealous, seeing as that might not make you able to work together with other Hwarang
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						has_dlc = "Way of Life"
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_focus = focus_family
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					OR = {
						has_focus = focus_war
						has_focus = focus_rulership
						has_focus = focus_theology
					}
				}
				# Switch to the Family focus
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1072 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						has_dlc = "Way of Life"
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_focus = focus_war
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					OR = {
						has_focus = focus_family
						has_focus = focus_rulership
						has_focus = focus_theology
					}
				}
				# Switch to the War focus
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1075 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						has_dlc = "Way of Life"
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_focus = focus_rulership
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					OR = {
						has_focus = focus_family
						has_focus = focus_war
						has_focus = focus_theology
					}
				}
				# Switch to the Rulership focus
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1078 } # Ping
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						has_dlc = "Way of Life"
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					has_focus = focus_theology
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					OR = {
						has_focus = focus_family
						has_focus = focus_war
						has_focus = focus_rulership
					}
				}
				# Switch to the Theology focus
				event_target:hwarang_leader = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1081 } # Ping
				}
			}
			75 = { # AI bypasses missions at times
				trigger = {
					ai = yes
				}
				random_list = {
					70 = {
						modifier = {
							factor = 0.9
							society_influence >= 30
						}
						modifier = {
							factor = 0.9
							society_influence >= 40
						}
						modifier = {
							factor = 0.8
							society_influence >= 50
						}
						modifier = {
							factor = 0.7
							society_influence >= 70
						}
						modifier = {
							factor = 0.6
							society_influence >= 80
						}
						modifier = {
							factor = 0.5
							society_influence >= 90
						}
						add_mission_succeed_influence_effect = yes
					}
					30 = {
						add_mission_fail_influence_effect = yes
					}
				}
			}
			200 = {
				trigger = {
					ai = yes
				}
				# Do nothing
			}
		}
	}
}

### Mission - Clean up your appearance

# Ping
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1042
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			society_quest_event = { id = hwarang.1043 }
		}
	}
}

# Inform the member
society_quest_event = {
	id = hwarang.1043
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1043
	border = GFX_event_letter_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ACCEPT
		ROOT = {
			set_quest_target = {
				id = quest_hwarang_groomed
				holder = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = DECLINE
		custom_tooltip = { text = decline_quest_tooltip }

		add_character_modifier = {
			name = quest_cooldown_timer
			hidden = yes
			days = 1000
		}

		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

### Mission - Seek Spiritual Guidance

# Ping
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1044
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		FROM = {
			society_quest_event = { id = hwarang.1045 }

# Ping
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1052
	hide_window = yes

	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			society_quest_event = { id = hwarang.1053 }
		}
	}
}

# Inform the member
society_quest_event = {
	id = hwarang.1053
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1053
	border = GFX_event_letter_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ACCEPT
		ROOT = {
			set_quest_target = {
				id = quest_hwarang_diligent
				holder = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = DECLINE
		custom_tooltip = { text = decline_quest_tooltip }

		add_character_modifier = {
			name = quest_cooldown_timer
			hidden = yes
			days = 1000
		}

		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

### Mission - Select the Family focus

# Ping
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1072
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			society_quest_event = { id = hwarang.1073 }
		}
	}
}

# Inform the member
society_quest_event = {
	id = hwarang.1073
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1073
	border = GFX_event_letter_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = ACCEPT
		ROOT = {
			set_quest_target = {
				id = quest_hwarang_family_focus
				holder = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = DECLINE
		custom_tooltip = { text = decline_quest_tooltip }

		add_character_modifier = {
			name = quest_cooldown_timer
			hidden = yes
			days = 1000
		}

		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
	
	after = {
		hidden_effect = { #For the one who instantly selected the focus, bypassing the mission-trigger
			if = {
				limit = { has_focus = focus_family }
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1074 days = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# on_focus_selected: Changing to Family focus
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1074
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1074
	picture = GFX_evt_china_expansionist
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		has_quest = quest_hwarang_family_focus
		has_focus = focus_family
	}

	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1074
		clr_quest = quest_hwarang_family_focus
		add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
	}
}

### on_yearly_pulse handling of missions you've completed in unexpected ways

# Check if the current mission has been completed - no need to check focus-related missions or Spiritual Guidance
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1084
	hide_window = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		OR = {
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_groomed
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_brave
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_honest
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_just
			has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_groomed
						trait = groomed
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
						trait = chaste
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
						trait = temperate
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
						trait = charitable
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
						trait = diligent
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
						trait = patient
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
						trait = kind
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
						trait = humble
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_brave
						trait = brave
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_content
						trait = content
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_gregarious
						trait = gregarious
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_honest
						trait = honest
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_just
						trait = just
					}
					AND = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
						trait = trusting
					}
				}
			}
			random_society_member = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							is_society_grandmaster = yes
							NOT = {
								character = ROOT
							}
						}
						AND = {
							society_rank == 3
							ROOT = {
								is_society_grandmaster = yes
							}
						}
					}
					same_society_as = ROOT
				}
				preferred_limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_rival = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_leader
			}
			event_target:hwarang_leader = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1085 } # Ping
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ping congratulating person
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1085
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			letter_event = { id = hwarang.1086 }
		}
	}
}

# Your quest is complete!
letter_event = {
	id = hwarang.1086
	border = GFX_event_letter_frame_religion
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1086

	portrait = event_target:hwarang_leader
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1086 # Great!
		
		clr_quest = yes
		add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
	}
}

# 1087 is not a real number!



##### General flavour events - triggered from on_society_pulse in 00_on_actions.txt

### Child member requests a few pointers

# Child member gets the opportunity to approach someone
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1088
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1088
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	is_in_society = yes
	min_age = 12
	max_age = 15
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		NOT = {
			has_character_flag = hwarang_mentoring
		}
		any_society_member = {
			society_member_of = hwarang
			is_adult = yes
			is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = yes
			NOT = {
				any_rival = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_character_flag = hwarang_mentoring
		random_society_member = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
				is_adult = yes
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = yes
				NOT = {
					any_rival = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = hwarang_mentor
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1088 # I'll ask!
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		
		event_target:hwarang_mentor = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1089 days = 5 random = 5 } # Inform older Hwarang
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1088 # I'll pass!
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

# Adult member approached
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1089
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1089
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1089 # Sure!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1090 } # Inform child
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = slothful
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROM = {
					is_female = yes
				}
				is_female = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1089 # I don't think so!
		
		detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1091 } # Inform child
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = diligent
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROM = {
					is_female = yes
				}
				is_female = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					value = 25
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Request accepted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1090
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1090
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1090 # Great!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1092 days = 90 random = 90 } # Ping teacher
		}
	}
}

# Request refused
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1091
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1091
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1091 # I see...
		
		prestige = -10
	}
}

# Ping teacher to see what happens
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1092
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			100 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					is_maimed_trigger = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					FROM = {
						is_maimed_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1093 } # PCS
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					NOR = {
						has_education_martial_trigger = yes
						has_lifestyle_martial_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						attribute_diff = {
							character = FROM
							attribute = martial
							value >= 1
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1095 } # Martial
				}
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						trait = chaste
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0

						OR = {
							trait = chaste
							trait = lustful

					}

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1093 # Great!
		
		add_one_duel_experience_modifier = yes
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1094 } # Inform FROM
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1110
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1110
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1110 # Great!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

# Training goes well - child picks up Brave
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1111
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1111
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1111 # Great!
		
		add_trait = brave
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1112 } # Inform FROM
		}
	}
}

# Training goes poorly - child injured
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1127
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1127
	picture = GFX_evt_dueling_knights_hf
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1127 # Curses!
		
		add_trait = wounded
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1128 } # Inform FROM
		}
	}
}

# Inform teacher
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1128
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1128
	picture = GFX_evt_dueling_knights_hf
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1128 # I see...
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

# Inform teacher
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1160

	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1160 # I hate you too!
		
		add_rival = FROM
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

### Religious schooling for child

# You are offered religious schooling - accept?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1161
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1161
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	is_in_society = yes
	min_age = 12
	max_age = 15
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		NOT = {
			has_character_flag = hwarang_religious_schooling
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_character_flag = hwarang_religious_schooling
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1161 # Sure!
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = erudite
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1162 days = 90 random = 90 } # Erudite
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = chaste
						trait = lustful
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1163 days = 90 random = 90 } # Chaste
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = temperate
						trait = gluttonous
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1164 days = 90 random = 90 } # Temperate
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = charitable
						trait = greedy
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1165 days = 90 random = 90 } # Charitable
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = diligent
						trait = slothful
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1166 days = 90 random = 90 } # Diligent
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = patient
						trait = wroth
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1167 days = 90 random = 90 } # Patient
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = kind
						trait = envious
						trait = cruel
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1168 days = 90 random = 90 } # Kind
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = humble
						trait = proud
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1169 days = 90 random = 90 } # Humble
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = zealous
						trait = cynical
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1170 days = 90 random = 90 } # Zealous
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1171 days = 90 random = 90 } # Gain piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1172 days = 90 random = 90 } # Gain society currency
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = cynical
						trait = zealous
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1173 days = 90 random = 90 } # Cynical
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1174 days = 90 random = 90 } # Lose piety
			}
			10 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1175 days = 90 random = 90 } # Lose society currency
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1161 # I don't think so!
		
		piety = -50
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					trait = slothful
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					trait = cynical
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Religious schooling goes well - gain Erudite
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1162
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1162
	picture = GFX_evt_religious_exultation
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1162 # Great!
		
		add_trait = erudite
	}
}

### Adult member considers recruiting a child in their court

# You know of a child that might be good to recruit into the Hwarang - attempt recruitment?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1176
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1176
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	only_playable = yes
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		any_courtier = {
			is_adult = no
			age = 12
			is_landed = no
			is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						religion = buddhist
						religion = taoist
					}
					culture_group = koreanic
				}
				religion = korean_pagan
				religion = korean_pagan_reformed
			}
			is_in_society = no
			NOT = {
				has_character_modifier = not_interested_in_hwarang
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		random_courtier = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = no
				age = 12
				is_landed = no
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
						culture_group = koreanic
					}
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
				is_in_society = no
				NOT = {
					has_character_modifier = not_interested_in_hwarang
				}
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				is_close_relative = ROOT
				OR = {
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							is_female = yes
							has_religion_feature = religion_matriarchal
							has_religion_feature = religion_equal
						}
					}
					is_female = no
				}
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				dynasty = ROOT
				OR = {
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							is_female = yes
							has_religion_feature = religion_matriarchal
							has_religion_feature = religion_equal
						}
					}
					is_female = no
				}
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				OR = {
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							is_female = yes
							has_religion_feature = religion_matriarchal
							has_religion_feature = religion_equal
						}
					}
					is_female = no
				}
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				is_close_relative = ROOT
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				dynasty = ROOT
			}
			save_event_target_as = hwarang_recruit
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1176 # I'll recruit them!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1177 } # How do you want to approach the matter?
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
					is_female = yes
				}
				NOR = {
					is_female = yes
					any_friend = {
						character = event_target:hwarang_recruit
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = event_target:hwarang_recruit
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1176 # I don't think they should be a Hwarang...
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					AND = {
						culture_group = koreanic
						OR = {
							religion = buddhist
							religion = taoist
						}
					}
					religion = korean_pagan
					religion = korean_pagan_reformed
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = event_target:hwarang_recruit
					value = 50
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
					is_female = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# How do you want to recruit them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1177
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1177
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1177 # I'll speak of the value of making allies!
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_recruitment_diplomacy
		}
		
		event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1178 days = 5 random = 5 } # Attempt made
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				has_education_diplomacy_trigger = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
					NOT = {
						has_focus = focus_ed_diplomacy
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1177 # I'll speak of the value of being a great warrior!
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_recruitment_martial
		}
		
		event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1179 days = 5 random = 5 } # Attempt made
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				has_education_martial_trigger = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
					NOT = {
						has_focus = focus_ed_martial
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1177 # I'll speak of the value of learning proper rulership!
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_recruitment_stewardship
		}
		
		event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1180 days = 5 random = 5 } # Attempt made
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				has_education_stewardship_trigger = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
					NOT = {
						has_focus = focus_ed_stewardship
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_1177 # I'll speak of the value of religious studies!
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_recruitment_learning
		}
		
		event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1181 days = 5 random = 5 } # Attempt made
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				has_education_learning_trigger = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:hwarang_recruit = {
					NOT = {
						has_focus = focus_ed_learning
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Child approached - diplomacy
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1178
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1178
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1178 # I'll join!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 } # Joining event!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1182 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					diplomacy = 24
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					diplomacy = 20
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					diplomacy = 16
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1178 # I don't think so!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1183 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 12
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 8
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 4
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				NOT = {
					has_focus = focus_ed_diplomacy
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_friend = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Child approached - martial

# Child approached - stewardship
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1180
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1180
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_economy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1180 # I'll join!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 } # Joining event!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1182 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					stewardship = 24
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					stewardship = 20
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					stewardship = 16
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1180 # I don't think so!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1183 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						stewardship = 12
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						stewardship = 8
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						stewardship = 4
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = {
					has_focus = focus_ed_stewardship
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_friend = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Child approached - learning

		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1182 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					learning = 24
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					learning = 20
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					learning = 16
				}
			}

				factor = 0

				}

		}
	}

		}

				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						learning = 12
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = {
					NOT = {
						learning = 8
					}
				}
			}

				factor = 2

						learning = 4
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				NOT = {
					has_focus = focus_ed_diplomacy
				}
			}

				factor = 10
				NOT = {
					religion = FROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_friend = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}

### Wonhwa seeks to murder rival Wonhwa

# You are a Wonhwa and have a rival Wonhwa - try to arrange a meeting to murder them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1184
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1184
	picture = GFX_evt_shadow
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	only_women = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		NOR = {
			trait = honest
			trait = just
		}
		any_rival = {
			is_female = yes
			is_adult = yes
			society_member_of = hwarang
			is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = junjeong
		random_rival = {
			limit = {
				is_female = yes
				is_adult = yes
				society_member_of = hwarang
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				trait = trusting
			}
			preferred_limit = {
				NOT = {
					trait = paranoid
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = nammo
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1184 # Yes!
		
		event_target:nammo = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1185 days = 15 random = 15 } # Target gets the invitation
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1184 # No!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

# You were invited to a meeting by your rival - do you want to go?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1185
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1185
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1185 # Sure!
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1187 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = brave
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1185 # I don't want to meet FROM!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1186 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = craven
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1185 # I should watch for trechery...
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1187 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = brave
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			trait = paranoid
		}
		
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_1185 # It is obviously a trap...
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1186 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = craven
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ping FROM
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1188
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1189 } # Back to FROM
		}
	}
}

# Target arrived at meeting - what's the plan (poison, direct attack, neutral conversation, attempt to patch things up)?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1189
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1189
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1189 # I'll use a subtle approach!
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					event_target:nammo = {
						trait = paranoid
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:nammo
						attribute = intrigue
						value <= -1
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.2
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:nammo
						attribute = intrigue
						value <= -5
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:nammo
						attribute = intrigue
						value <= -10
					}
				}
				event_target:nammo = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1190 days = 2 random = 2 } # Target notices nothing
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:nammo
						attribute = intrigue
						value >= 1
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.2
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:nammo
						attribute = intrigue
						value >= 5
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:nammo
						attribute = intrigue
						value >= 10
					}
				}
				event_target:nammo = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1195 days = 2 random = 2 } # Target notices poison
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_education_intrigue_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_lifestyle_intrigue_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				attribute_diff = {
					who = event_target:nammo
					attribute = intrigue
					value <= -10
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = brave
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 # If the rivalry somehow ended, don't go through with the murder
				NOT = {
					any_rival = {
						character = event_target:nammo
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1189 # I'll use a direct approach!
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_junjeong_nammo_attack
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:nammo = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:nammo = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:nammo = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		event_target:nammo = { 
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1212 days = 1 } # Target is attacked
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_education_martial_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_lifestyle_martial_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				combat_rating_diff = {
					who = event_target:nammo
					value <= -10
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				combat_rating_diff = {
					who = event_target:nammo
					value <= -25
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				combat_rating_diff = {
					who = event_target:nammo
					value <= -50
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = craven
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0 # If the rivalry somehow ended, don't go through with the murder
				NOT = {
					any_rival = {
						character = event_target:nammo
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1189 # You know, let's not do the murder thing...
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
		
		event_target:nammo = { 
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1217 days = 2 random = 2 } # Target notified
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					trait = kind
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_1189 # You know, maybe this rivalry is overrated...
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		event_target:nammo = { 
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1220 days = 1 } # Target receives suggestion to end rivalry
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				NOT = {
					trait = kind
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Subtle approach - target is smart enough to notice - swap tea cups or spill yours?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1195
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1195
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1195 # Turnabout is fair play!
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_junjeong_nammo_swap
		}
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					event_target:junjeong = {
						trait = paranoid
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:junjeong
						attribute = intrigue
						value <= -1
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.2
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:junjeong
						attribute = intrigue
						value <= -5
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:junjeong
						attribute = intrigue
						value <= -10
					}
				}
				event_target:junjeong = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1196 } # Original plotter notices nothing
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.5
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:junjeong
						attribute = intrigue
						value >= 1
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.2
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:junjeong
						attribute = intrigue
						value >= 5
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					attribute_diff = {
						who = event_target:junjeong
						attribute = intrigue
						value >= 10
					}
				}
				event_target:junjeong = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1200 } # Original plotter notices poison
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_education_intrigue_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_lifestyle_intrigue_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				attribute_diff = {
					who = event_target:junjeong
					attribute = intrigue
					value <= -10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1195 # I'll pretend to spill it...
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_junjeong_nammo_spill
		}
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1209 } # Original plotter notified of spilled tea
		}
		
		prestige = -5
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				attribute_diff = {
					who = event_target:junjeong
					attribute = intrigue
					value >= 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
