# Cups swapped - original plotter notices - spill your tea or abandon all subtlety?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1200
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1200
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1200 # I'll pretend to spill it...
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_junjeong_nammo_spill
		}
		
		event_target:nammo = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1201 days = 1 } # Target notified of spilled tea
		}
		
		prestige = -5
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				attribute_diff = {
					who = event_target:junjeong
					attribute = intrigue
					value >= 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1200 # So much for subtlety...
		
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = hwarang_junjeong_nammo_attack
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
				is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:nammo = {
						is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
					}
				}
				detract_grace_major_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:nammo = {
						any_close_relative = {
							dynasty = PREV
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:nammo = {
						any_dynasty_member = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
				}
				detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
			}
		}
		
		event_target:nammo = { 
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1204 days = 1 } # Target is attacked
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_education_martial_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_lifestyle_martial_trigger = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				combat_rating_diff = {
					who = event_target:nammo
					value <= -10
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				combat_rating_diff = {
					who = event_target:nammo
					value <= -25
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				combat_rating_diff = {
					who = event_target:nammo
					value <= -50
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = craven
			}
		}
	}
}

# Original plotter spills their tea - just continue as if nothing happened
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1201
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1201
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1201 # Well, that's that...
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1202 days = 2 }
		}
		event_target:nammo = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1203 days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

# Departure - original plotter
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1202
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1202
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1202 # I need to watch my back...
		
		opinion = {
			who = event_target:nammo
			modifier = opinion_murder_attempt
		}
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_dlc = "Jade Dragon"
					is_chinese_emperor_trigger = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:nammo = {
							is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
						}
					}
					detract_grace_major_effect = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:nammo = {
							any_close_relative = {
								dynasty = PREV
								is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
							}
						}
					}
					detract_grace_medium_effect = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:nammo = {
							any_dynasty_member = {
								is_chinese_emperor_trigger = yes
							}
						}
					}
					detract_grace_minor_effect = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Original plotter attacks you - time to fight
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1204
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1204
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1204 # I won't go down without a fight!
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			set_variable = {
				which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
				value = 0
			}
			export_to_variable = {
				which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
				value = combat_rating
				who = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					trait = paranoid
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = 50
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					trait = trusting
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = -25
				}
			}
			event_target:junjeong = {
				set_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = 0
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = combat_rating
					who = PREV
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = -1
				}
				ROOT = {
					change_variable = {
						which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
						which = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
						value = 1
					}
				}
				event_target:junjeong = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1205 } # Original plotter dies
				}
				event_target:nammo = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1206 } # Target survives
				}
			}
			else = {
				event_target:junjeong = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1207 } # Original plotter wins
				}
				event_target:nammo = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1208 } # Target dies
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Original plotter dies - original plotter
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1205
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1205
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1205 # Not like this!
		
		prestige = -100
		
		death = {
			death_reason = death_self_defense
			killer = event_target:nammo
		}
	}
}

# Original plotter attacks you - time to fight
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1212
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1212
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1212 # I won't go down without a fight!
		
		hidden_tooltip = {
			set_variable = {
				which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
				value = 0
			}
			export_to_variable = {
				which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
				value = combat_rating
				who = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					trait = paranoid
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = 25 # Lower than for the other one; you've not noticed a previous murder attempt here...
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					trait = trusting
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = -50 # Lower than for the other one; you've not noticed a previous murder attempt here...
				}
			}
			event_target:junjeong = {
				set_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = 0
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = combat_rating
					who = PREV
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
					value = -1
				}
				ROOT = {
					change_variable = {
						which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
						which = PREV
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = nammo_junjeong_fight_score
						value = 1
					}
				}
				event_target:junjeong = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1213 } # Original plotter dies
				}
				event_target:nammo = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1214 } # Target survives
				}
			}
			else = {
				event_target:junjeong = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1215 } # Original plotter wins
				}
				event_target:nammo = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1216 } # Target dies
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Original plotter dies - original plotter

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1218 # Well, it could have been worse...
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

# Departure after neutral conversation - target
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1219
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1219
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable

	is_triggered_only = yes

	}

# Original plotter suggests end to rivalry - how do you respond?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1220
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1220
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1220 # Sure!
		
		remove_rival = event_target:junjeong
		
		add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1221 } # Inform the ex-rival
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = event_target:junjeong
						value = -50
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1220 # I don't think so...
		
		detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1224 } # Inform the rival
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				opinion = {
					who = event_target:junjeong
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# End to rivalry accepted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1221
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1221
	picture = GFX_evt_china_stable
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1221 # Great!
		
		add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		event_target:junjeong = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1222 days = 2 }
		}
		event_target:nammo = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1223 days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

# Departure after end to rivalry - original plotter

	id = hwarang.1222

	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {

### Various beneficial characters show up

# Unknown Hwarang offers to serve you
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1227
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1227
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	is_in_society = yes
	only_playable = yes
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
	}
	
	immediate = {
		create_random_soldier = {
			age = 16
			female = no
			culture = korean
			religion = buddhist
			trait = mahayana_buddhist
			dynasty = random
			attributes = {
				diplomacy = 6
				martial = 8
				stewardship = 4
				intrigue = 0
				learning = 4
			}
			trait = groomed
			trait = brave
			trait = trusting
			random_traits = yes
		}
		save_event_target_as = new_hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1227 # I'll arrange it!
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		event_target:new_hwarang = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_loyal_servant
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1037 } # Join the Hwarang
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1227 # You, a Hwarang? Ha!
		
		piety = -10
		
		event_target:new_hwarang = {
			leave_court_and_die_effect = yes
		}
	}
}

# Korean Buddhist monk/nun offers their services
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1228
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1228
	picture = GFX_evt_meditating_in_temple
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	is_in_society = yes
	only_playable = yes
	religion = buddhist
	
	trigger = {
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
	}
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				create_random_priest = {
					age = 40
					female = no
					culture = korean
					religion = buddhist
					trait = mahayana_buddhist
					dynasty = none
					attributes = {
						diplomacy = 6
						martial = 2
						stewardship = 4
						intrigue = 0
						learning = 10
					}
					trait = bhikkhu
					trait = zealous
					trait = just
					trait = diligent
					trait = patient
					trait = kind
					random_traits = yes
				}
				save_event_target_as = new_buddhist
			}
			50 = {
				create_random_priest = {
					age = 40
					female = yes
					culture = korean
					religion = buddhist
					trait = mahayana_buddhist
					dynasty = none
					attributes = {
						diplomacy = 6
						martial = 2
						stewardship = 4
						intrigue = 0
						learning = 10
					}
					trait = bhikkhuni
					trait = zealous
					trait = just
					trait = diligent
					trait = patient
					trait = kind
					random_traits = yes
				}
				save_event_target_as = new_buddhist
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1228 # Sounds good!
		
		event_target:new_buddhist = {
			opinion = {
				who = ROOT
				modifier = opinion_loyal_servant
			}
		}
	}
}

# Foreign Buddhist monk/nun offers their services

	id = hwarang.1229
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1229

			50 = {
				create_random_priest = {
					age = 40
					female = no
					culture = random

					dynasty = none

						diplomacy = 6
						martial = 2
						stewardship = 4

					age = 40
					female = yes
					culture = random

					dynasty = none

						diplomacy = 6

					trait = patient

### Visit liege's court to show your allegiance

# You have the opportunity to visit your liege's court - take it?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1230
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1230
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	only_playable = yes
	
	trigger = {
		war = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		independent = no
		liege = {
			is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
			OR = {
				government = chinese_imperial_government
				government = chinese_vassal_government
			}
			NOT = {
				any_rival = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_well
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_poorly
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1230 # I'll go!
		
		liege = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1231 days = 10 random = 10 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1230 # I think not!
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

# Hwarang arrives at your court to show allegiance - welcome them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1231
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1231
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1231 # I'll welcome them, of course!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1233 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1231 # I'll send them away!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1232 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Liege did not welcome you - head back home
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1232
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1232
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1232 # How rude!
		
		prestige = -25
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_dislike
		}
	}
}

# Welcomed - what do you want to do now?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1233
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1233
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			random_demesne_title = {
				limit = {
					lower_tier_than = PREV
					claimed_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						higher_tier_than = ROOT
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = claim_to_abandon
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1233 # I'll just engage in small talk!
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					diplomacy = 24
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					diplomacy = 20
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					diplomacy = 16
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1234 days = 5 random = 5 } # It goes well
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 12
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 8
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 4
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1236 days = 5 random = 5 } # It goes poorly
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = chaste
					liege = {
						NOR = {
							trait = chaste
							trait = lustful
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = temperate
					liege = {
						NOR = {
							trait = temperate
							trait = gluttonous
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = charitable
					liege = {
						NOR = {
							trait = charitable
							trait = greedy
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = diligent
					liege = {
						NOR = {
							trait = diligent
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = patient
					liege = {
						NOR = {
							trait = patient
							trait = wroth
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = kind
					liege = {
						NOR = {
							trait = kind
							trait = envious
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = humble
					liege = {
						NOR = {
							trait = humble
							trait = proud
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1233 # I'll offer to help my liege pick up a virtue!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1238 days = 5 random = 5 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					religion = FROM
				}
			}
			modifier  = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:claim_to_abandon = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1233 # I'll give up a claim!
		
		event_target:claim_to_abandon = {
			remove_claim = ROOT
		}
		
		add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		set_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_well
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1241 days = 5 random = 5 } # Inform liege
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
}

# Small talk goes well - inform liege
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1234
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1234
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1234 # Great!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1235 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		opinion = {
			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_praised_me
		}
	}
}

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_hwarang_insulted_me
		}
	}

# Small talk goes poorly - inform Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1237
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1237
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1237 # I see...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		set_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_poorly
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1242 days = 5 random = 5 }
	}
}

# Offered to help liege pick up a good trait you have - liege
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1238
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1238
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1238 # Sure!
		
		random_list = {
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = chaste
						trait = lustful
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = chaste
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = chaste
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = temperate
						trait = gluttonous
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = temperate
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = temperate
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = charitable
						trait = greedy
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = charitable
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = charitable
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = diligent
						trait = slothful
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = diligent
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = diligent
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = patient
						trait = wroth
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = patient
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = patient
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = kind
						trait = envious
						trait = cruel
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = kind
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = kind

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = humble
						trait = proud
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = humble
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = humble
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1239 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1238 # I don't think so!
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1240 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
}

# Offer accepted
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1239
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1239
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1239 # Great!
		
		add_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
		
		set_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_well
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1242 days = 5 random = 5 }
	}
}

	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1241
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

			character_event = { id = hwarang.1242 days = 5 random = 5 }
		}
	}
}

# Determine how the visit went
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1242
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_well
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1243 } # Possible reward
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1247 days = 5 } # Heading home
		}
		else = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1249 } # Heading home
		}
	}
}

# Visit went well - do you want to attempt to go for a reward?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1243
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1243
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			liege = {
				NOR = {
					any_friend = {
						character = ROOT
					}
					any_rival = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1243 # Maybe we can be friends?
		
		liege = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1244 days = 2 random = 2 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = liege
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1243 # I only did my duty...
		
		add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Hwarang proposes friendship - liege
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1244
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1244
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1244 # Sure!
		
		add_friend = FROM
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1245 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 25
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1244 # Let's not get carried away here...
		
		prestige = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1246 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### Visit other Hwarang's court to show your trust

# You have the opportunity to visit another Hwarang's court - take it?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1251
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1251
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	only_playable = yes
	
	trigger = {
		war = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		independent = no
		any_society_member = {
			is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
			society_member_of = hwarang
			is_landed = yes
			NOT = {
				character = ROOT
			}
			NOT = {
				any_rival = {
					character = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		random_society_member = {
			limit = {
				is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
				society_member_of = hwarang
				is_landed = yes
				NOT = {
					character = ROOT
				}
				NOT = {
					any_rival = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = hwarang_host
		}
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_well
		clr_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_poorly
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1251 # I'll go!
		
		event_target:hwarang_host = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1252 days = 10 random = 10 } # Inform host
		}
		
		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1251 # I think not!
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

# Hwarang arrives at your court - welcome them?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1252
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1252
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1252 # I'll welcome them, of course!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1254 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1252 # I'll send them away!
		
		detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1253 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Other Hwarang did not welcome you - head back home

			who = FROM
			modifier = opinion_dislike
		}
	}
}

# Welcomed - what do you want to do now?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1254
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1254
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FROM = {
			random_demesne_title = {
				limit = {
					lower_tier_than = PREV
					claimed_by = ROOT
					NOT = {
						higher_tier_than = ROOT
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = claim_to_abandon
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1254 # I'll just engage in small talk!
		
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					diplomacy = 24
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					diplomacy = 20
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					diplomacy = 16
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1255 days = 5 random = 5 } # It goes well
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 12
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 8
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					NOT = {
						diplomacy = 4
					}
				}
				FROM = {
					character_event = { id = hwarang.1257 days = 5 random = 5 } # It goes poorly
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					trait = chaste
					event_target:hwarang_host = {
						NOR = {
							trait = chaste
							trait = lustful
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = temperate
					event_target:hwarang_host = {
						NOR = {
							trait = temperate
							trait = gluttonous
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = charitable
					event_target:hwarang_host = {
						NOR = {
							trait = charitable
							trait = greedy
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = diligent
					event_target:hwarang_host = {
						NOR = {
							trait = diligent
							trait = slothful
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = patient
					event_target:hwarang_host = {
						NOR = {
							trait = patient
							trait = wroth
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = kind
					event_target:hwarang_host = {
						NOR = {
							trait = kind
							trait = envious
							trait = cruel
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					trait = humble
					event_target:hwarang_host = {
						NOR = {
							trait = humble
							trait = proud
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1254 # I'll offer to help my host pick up a virtue!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1259 days = 5 random = 5 } # Inform host
		}
		
		piety = 25
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					religion = FROM
				}
			}
			modifier  = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:claim_to_abandon = {
				always = yes
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1254 # I'll give up a claim!
		
		event_target:claim_to_abandon = {
			remove_claim = ROOT
		}
		
		add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
		
		set_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_well
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1262 days = 5 random = 5 } # Inform host
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = ambitious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_rival = {
					character = FROM
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = envious
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
		}
	}
}

# Offered to help host pick up a good trait you have - host
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1259
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1259
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1259 # Sure!
		
		random_list = {
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = chaste
						trait = lustful
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = chaste
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = chaste
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_chaste
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = temperate
						trait = gluttonous
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = temperate
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = temperate
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_temperate
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = charitable
						trait = greedy
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = charitable
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = charitable
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_charitable
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = diligent
						trait = slothful
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = diligent
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = diligent
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_diligent
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = patient
						trait = wroth
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = patient
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = patient
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_patient
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = kind
						trait = envious
						trait = cruel
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = kind
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = kind

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_kind
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						trait = humble
						trait = proud
						FROM = {
							NOT = {
								trait = humble
							}
						}
					}
				}
				add_trait = humble
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_humble
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1260 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = content
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1229 # I don't think so!
		
		piety = -25
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1261 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = zealous
			}
		}
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1261
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1261
	picture = GFX_evt_china_diplomatic_incident
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1261 # I see...
		
		set_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_poorly
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1263 days = 5 random = 5 }
	}
}

# Hwarang gave up claim - inform host
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1262
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1262
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1262 # Great!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1263 days = 5 random = 5 }
		}
	}
}

# Determine how the visit went
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1263
	hide_window = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = hwarang_court_visit_went_well
			}
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1264 } # Possible reward
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1268 days = 5 } # Heading home
		}
		else = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1270 } # Heading home
		}
	}
}

# Visit went well - do you want to attempt to go for a reward?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1264
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1264
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			event_target:hwarang_host = {
				NOR = {
					any_friend = {
						character = ROOT
					}
					any_rival = {
						character = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1264 # Maybe we can be friends?
		
		event_target:hwarang_host = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1265 days = 2 random = 2 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = event_target:hwarang_host
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1264 # I only did my duty...
		
		add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

# Hwarang proposes friendship - host
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1265
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1265
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1265 # Sure!
		
		add_friend = FROM
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1266 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = 25
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1265 # Let's not get carried away here...
		
		detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1267 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Hwarang heads home - Hwarang
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1268
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1268
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1268 # That was rather fun...
		
		prestige = 50
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = paranoid
			}
			random = {
				chance = 50
				remove_trait = paranoid
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					trait = trusting
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 50
				add_trait = trusting
		
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
					}
					clr_quest = quest_hwarang_trusting
					add_society_currency_medium_effect = yes
				}
			}
		}
		
		event_target:hwarang_host = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1269 } # Inform host
		}
	}
}

# Hwarang heads home - host

### Reconsider grudge with family

# You have a rivalry with a family member (close relative or dynasty member) - reconsider it?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1272
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1272
	picture = GFX_evt_rival_rulers
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
		any_rival = {
			is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
			OR = {
				any_close_relative = {
					character = ROOT
				}
				dynasty = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		random_list = {
			100 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						any_rival = {
							is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
							any_child = {
								character = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
				}
				# Parents
				random_rival = {
					limit = {
						is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
						any_child = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = hwarang_rival
				}
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						any_rival = {
							is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
							any_child_even_if_dead = {
								any_child_even_if_dead = {
									character = ROOT
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				# Grandparents
				random_rival = {
					limit = {
						is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
						any_child_even_if_dead = {
							any_child_even_if_dead = {
								character = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = hwarang_rival
				}
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						any_rival = {
							is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
							any_close_relative = {
								character = ROOT
							}
						}
					}
				}
				# Close relatives
				random_rival = {
					limit = {
						is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
						any_close_relative = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = hwarang_rival
				}
			}
			1 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = {
						any_rival = {
							is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
							dynasty = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
				# Any dynasty member
				random_rival = {
					limit = {
						is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
						dynasty = ROOT
					}
					save_event_target_as = hwarang_rival
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1272 # It's time to end the rivalry...
		
		event_target:hwarang_rival = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1273 days = 5 random = 5 } # Rival approached
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = event_target:hwarang_rival
						value = -50
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1272 # No! I still hate them!
		
		detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				opinion = {
					who = event_target:hwarang_rival
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Rival approached about end to rivalry
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1273
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1273
	picture = GFX_evt_emissary
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1273 # It's time to end the rivalry...
		
		remove_rival = FROM
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1274 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = cynical
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				trait = stubborn
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = paranoid
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = proud
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					opinion = {
						who = FROM
						value = -50
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1273 # No! I still hate them!
		
		FROM = {
			character_event = { id = hwarang.1275 } # Inform FROM
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				society_member_of = hwarang
			}
			detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = kind
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = trusting
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				trait = humble
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				opinion = {
					who = FROM
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Rivalry ended

	id = hwarang.1274
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1274
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1274 # Great!
		
		add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
		
		remove_rival = FROM
	}
}

	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat

		add_society_currency_trivial_effect = yes
	}
}

### Attractive Hwarang gets possible romantic attention

# Someone thinks highly of your appearance and suggests tumbling - do you accept?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1276
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1276
	picture = GFX_evt_dancing
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
		is_maimed_trigger = no
		has_disease_trigger = no
		is_ill_trigger = no
		trait = groomed # Take the decision!
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = no
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
			}
			create_character = {
				age = 16
				female = yes
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				random_traits = yes
				trait = fair
				trait = lustful
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_lover
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = yes
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
			}
			create_character = {
				age = 16
				female = no
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				random_traits = yes
				trait = fair
				trait = lustful
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_lover
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = yes
				trait = homosexual
			}
			create_character = {
				age = 16
				female = yes
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				random_traits = yes
				trait = fair
				trait = lustful
				trait = homosexual
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_lover
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				is_female = no
				trait = homosexual
			}
			create_character = {
				age = 16
				female = no
				dynasty = none
				culture = ROOT
				religion = ROOT
				random_traits = yes
				trait = fair
				trait = lustful
				trait = homosexual
			}
			new_character = {
				save_event_target_as = hwarang_lover
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1276 # Yes, and become lovers!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = chaste
			}
			remove_trait = chaste
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = celibate
			}
			remove_trait = celibate
		}
		
		piety = -25
		
		event_target:hwarang_lover = {
			save_event_target_as = sex_partner
			add_lover = ROOT
		}
		unprotected_sex_effect_event_target = yes
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			# Riskier for women
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				is_female = yes
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
				NOT = {
					age = 45
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				is_female = yes
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
				NOT = {
					age = 45
				}
				OR = {
					is_married = yes
					is_consort = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = celibate
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = chaste
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_lover = {
					OR = {
						any_spouse = {
							character = ROOT
						}
						any_consort = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1276 # Yes, but only this once!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = chaste
			}
			remove_trait = chaste
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = celibate
			}
			remove_trait = celibate
		}
		
		event_target:hwarang_lover = {
			save_event_target_as = sex_partner
			leave_court_effect = yes
		}
		unprotected_sex_effect_event_target = yes
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			# Riskier for women
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				is_female = yes
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
				NOT = {
					age = 45
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				is_female = yes
				NOT = {
					trait = homosexual
				}
				NOT = {
					age = 45
				}
				OR = {
					is_married = yes
					is_consort = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = celibate
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = chaste
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_lover = {
					OR = {
						any_spouse = {
							character = ROOT
						}
						any_consort = {
							character = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1276 # No!
		
		event_target:hwarang_lover = {
			leave_court_and_die_effect = yes
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				trait = lustful
			}
		}
	}
}

### Combat or education improvment

# You have a T1 intrigue education - do you want to change to a Hwarang-approved one?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1277
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1277
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
		trait = amateurish_plotter
		NOT = {
			has_character_flag = hwarang_education_change_event
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_character_flag = hwarang_education_change_event
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1277 # Yes!
		
		character_event = { id = hwarang.1278 } # Select new trait
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1277 # No!
	}
}

# Which Hwarang-approved trait do you want?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1278
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1278
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_intrigue

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1278 # Naive Appeaser!
		
		remove_trait = amateurish_plotter
		add_trait = naive_appeaser
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1278 # Misguided Warrior
		
		remove_trait = amateurish_plotter
		add_trait = misguided_warrior
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1278 # Indulgent Wastrel!
		
		remove_trait = amateurish_plotter
		add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_1278 # Detached Priest!
		
		remove_trait = amateurish_plotter
		add_trait = detached_priest
	}
}

# You have a T1 education trait - do you wish to change to another Hwarang-approved one?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1279
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1279
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
		trait = amateurish_plotter
		NOT = {
			has_character_flag = hwarang_education_change_event
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_character_flag = hwarang_education_change_event
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = naive_appeaser
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1279 # Naive Appeaser!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = misguided_warrior
			}
			remove_trait = misguided_warrior
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = indulgent_wastrel
			}
			remove_trait = indulgent_wastrel
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = detached_priest
			}
			remove_trait = detached_priest
		}
		add_trait = naive_appeaser
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = misguided_warrior
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1279 # Misguided Warrior
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = naive_appeaser
			}
			remove_trait = naive_appeaser
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = indulgent_wastrel
			}
			remove_trait = indulgent_wastrel
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = detached_priest
			}
			remove_trait = detached_priest
		}
		add_trait = misguided_warrior
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = indulgent_wastrel
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTC_HWARANG_1279 # Indulgent Wastrel!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = naive_appeaser
			}
			remove_trait = naive_appeaser
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = misguided_warrior
			}
			remove_trait = misguided_warrior
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = detached_priest
			}
			remove_trait = detached_priest
		}
		add_trait = indulgent_wastrel
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				trait = detached_priest
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTD_HWARANG_1279 # Detached Priest!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = naive_appeaser
			}
			remove_trait = naive_appeaser
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = misguided_warrior
			}
			remove_trait = misguided_warrior
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = indulgent_wastrel
			}
			remove_trait = indulgent_wastrel
		}
		add_trait = detached_priest
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTE_HWARANG_1279 # I want to keep my current trait!
	}
}

# Diplomacy discussion - participate?
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1280
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1280
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1280 # I'll participate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1281 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gain prestige
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1282 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gain society currency 
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOR = {
						trait = charismatic_negotiator
						trait = underhanded_rogue
						trait = naive_appeaser
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1283 days = 5 random = 5 } # Improve education trait
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1284 days = 5 random = 5 } # Discussion goes okay
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1285 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lose prestige
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = grey_eminence
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					trait = charismatic_negotiator
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1286 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lose society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1280 # I think not!
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

# Discussion goes well - improve education trait
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1283
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1283
	picture = GFX_evt_china_golden_age
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_diplomacy

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1283 # Great!
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				trait = charismatic_negotiator
			}
			remove_trait = charismatic_negotiator
			add_trait = grey_eminence
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				trait = underhanded_rogue
			}
			remove_trait = underhanded_rogue
			add_trait = charismatic_negotiator
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				trait = naive_appeaser
			}
			remove_trait = naive_appeaser
			add_trait = underhanded_rogue
		}
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1287
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1287
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1287 # I'll participate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1288 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gain prestige
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1289 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gain society currency 
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOR = {
						trait = skilled_tactician
						trait = tough_soldier
						trait = misguided_warrior
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1290 days = 5 random = 5 } # Improve education trait
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1291 days = 5 random = 5 } # Discussion goes okay
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1292 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lose prestige
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = brilliant_strategist
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					trait = skilled_tactician
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1293 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lose society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1287 # I think not!
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1301
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1301
	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_religion

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	min_age = 16
	is_in_society = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_inaccessible_or_incapable_trigger = no
		society_member_of = hwarang
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1301 # I'll participate!
		
		random_list = {
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1302 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gain prestige
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1303 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gain society currency 
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOR = {
						trait = scholarly_theologian
						trait = martial_cleric
						trait = detached_priest
					}
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1304 days = 5 random = 5 } # Improve education trait
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1305 days = 5 random = 5 } # Discussion goes okay
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					trait = scholarly_theologian
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1306 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lose prestige
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					trait = mastermind_theologian
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					trait = scholarly_theologian
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1307 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lose society currency
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1301 # I think not!
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

	picture = GFX_evt_chinese_bureaucrat

		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1308 # I'll participate!
		
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					combat_rating = 50 # Too good to learn from randoms
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1309 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gained duel experience
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1310 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gained prestige
			}
			25 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1311 days = 5 random = 5 } # Gained society currency
			}
			50 = {
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1312 days = 5 random = 5 } # It goes okay
			}
			50 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					combat_rating = 50
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1313 days = 5 random = 5 } # Wounded
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					combat_rating = 50
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1314 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lost prestige
			}
			25 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					combat_rating = 50
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1315 days = 5 random = 5 } # Lost society currency
			}
			10 = {
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					combat_rating = 50
				}
				character_event = { id = hwarang.1316 days = 5 random = 5 } # Maimed
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1308 # I think not!
		
		detract_society_currency_tiny_effect = yes
	}
}

# Combat training goes well - gain duel experience
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1309
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1309
	picture = GFX_evt_dueling_knights_hf
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1309 # Great!
		
		add_one_duel_experience_modifier = yes
	}
}

# Combat training goes well - gain prestige
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1310
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1310
	picture = GFX_evt_dueling_knights_hf
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1310 # Great!
		
		prestige = 50
	}
}

	id = hwarang.1311

	picture = GFX_evt_dueling_knights_hf
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1311 # Great!
		
		add_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
	}
}

# Combat training goes okay
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1312
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1312
	picture = GFX_evt_dueling_knights_hf
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1310 # Could have been worse...
	}
}

# Combat training goes poorly - wounded
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1313
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1313
	picture = GFX_evt_dueling_knights_hf
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1313 # Ow!
		
		add_trait = wounded
		
		prestige = -10
	}
}

# Combat training goes poorly - lose prestige
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1314
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1314
	picture = GFX_evt_stressed_ruler
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1314 # Curses!
		
		prestige = -50
	}
}

# Combat training goes poorly - lose society currency
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1315
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1315
	picture = GFX_evt_stressed_ruler
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1315 # Curses!
		
		detract_society_currency_minor_effect = yes
	}
}

# Combat training goes extremely poorly - become maimed
character_event = {
	id = hwarang.1316
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1316
	picture = GFX_evt_bloody_man
	border = GFX_event_normal_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1316 # Curses!
		
		add_maimed_trait_effect = yes
	}
}

##### Other

# Refounding event
narrative_event = {
	id = hwarang.1317
	title = EVTTITLE_HWARANG_1317
	desc = EVTDESC_HWARANG_1317
	picture = GFX_evt_china_expansionist
	border = GFX_event_narrative_frame_war

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				character = FROM
			}
		}
		name = EVTOPTA_HWARANG_1317 # Interesting...
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			character = FROM
		}
		name = EVTOPTB_HWARANG_1317 # This will be beneficial!
	}
}
